SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_000.text:
What manner of activity
takes place here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_010.text:
Ah, the alien is in our midst! It's been a
great many cycles since an outsider last
visited us, so I suppose I could spare the
time to educate you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_020.text:
This is the laboratory of Green Division,
where we research various forms of life.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_030.text:
Life, is it? Mmm. I wonder if there is any
form of life here appealing enough to pluck
at the Dismal King's heartstrings?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_040.text:
The research of fiends and monsters falls under
the purview of Red Division. I assure you the
creatures we research are far more appealing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_050.text:
We in Green Division collect unusual life-forms
from various worlds, as well as flora and fauna
with medicinal properties. We also pursue
research into the fundaments of life itself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_060.text:
In fact, all the food, medical supplies,
and biologically derived fuels consumed
within the base are created here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_070.text:
Then you support the core infrastructure
of Delta Base itself—a significant task.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_080.text:
Yes, although research remains our division's
primary mission—which is why we have little
time to waste engaging with aliens.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_090.text:
Currently, I am only speaking with you because
I have an idle moment while I await the receipt
of some quantum cat specimens. Speaking of
which, why haven't they arrived yet?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_110.text:
Not to imply that I don't trust you, alien,
but we have valuable research samples
under our care, so I would ask you not to
go traipsing about the area.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_120.text:
Alternatively, if you would consent to our
examining you, injecting you with chemicals,
and then dissecting you, I'm certain there's
much of interest we could learn.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_130.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_130.text:
Attempting to know the Dismal King
is the errand of a fool.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Yes. I, um... Well, I actually wanted
to ask you a favor? Kind of?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh, I'm one of the researchers
from Green Division, by the way.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Another researcher fool enough to
make a study of the Dismal King?
Do not make me repeat myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_050.text:
What? Oh no! Nothing like that!
The favor actually involves catching
some quantum cats that ran away
from me down on the lower level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_060.text:
And you would have me
search for...lost cats.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Exactly! Those naughty cats ran away just as
I was preparing them for an experiment.
And if my division overseer hears of this...
Oh, I don't even want to think about it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_090.text:
See? You get it! If she found out, who KNOWS
what she might do with me!? Oh, but I don't
have a lot of body fat, so I probably wouldn't
make a good fuel source.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_091.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_091.text:
Last time I screwed up, she made me participate in
an experiment involving an elixir that was supposed
to make you smart, but I'm so dumb that not even
that could—wait, that doesn't matter right now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Explain how these 'quantum cats'
differ from the conventional kind.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_110.text:
There are two escaped cats: one named
Schrö, and the other named Dinger. But there is also only one escaped cat.
They are multiple, yet singular.
Deathless, yet not.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Quantum cats possess a mimetic ability
that causes other life-forms around them
to assume their appearance. As such, we have reports that the cat—
or cats—are hiding among fiends who now
ALSO appear to be quantum cats.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_130.text:
I asked a couple other lab workers to help
me capture the cats—er, or cat—but they all
ended up being attacked by monsters.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_150.text:
According to our research, quantum cats
are influenced by magnetic fields.
They cause real cats to face to the right,
and illusory cats to face to the left.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Which makes capturing them a trivial matter.
Now then how does one reach this lower floor?
I would behold these quantum cats.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Yes, well, now that I've explained all of that,
I'm coming with you. You wouldn't be able to
use the lift without me, is the thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_171.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_171.text:
Oh, and my name's Qu Magis,
but you can call me Mags.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_180.text:
I am quite looking forward
to this, Mags.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Did you verify which direction
it was facing?

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_020.text: To the right. No, the left.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_000.text:
So is this indeed one of
your quantum cats?

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_010.text:
It says 'Dinger' on its collar,
so it must be. Oh, what a relief
that we caught the right cat!

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_030.text: Ah, but the quantum cat you see isn't real. It's the cat you don't perceive that is the actual cat—one living on the boundary between dimensions.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_040.text:
You aver that beholding the cat makes it
impossible to capture it? Madness, Mags!
For we have captured the beast here!

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_050.text:
It's the collar. It's made of orichalcum,
which for some reason makes it possible
to interact with quantum cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_060.text:
What is it you people intend
to do with this quantum cat?

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh, we have lots to learn from them.
Why, they could easily lead to a new era
of massive technological discoveries!

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_080.text: You are in search of something.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_090.text:
Exactly! Er, why else did you think
we were researching life-forms?

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_100.text:
Immortality, of course. Your lives are limited,
thus you make a study of nature in hopes of
defying it. It is so tragically...human.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_110.text:
Wow, you're sharp! Although it's about
perpetual youth as well as immortality.
What do you think about that?

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_120.text:
I think you are fools. What is there
to be gained in granting eternal life
to the weak and sickly?

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_130.text:
Honestly, though? I don't think being
immortal would be very much fun.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_140.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_140.text:
I assure you that death
would suit you better.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_010.text:
Let's see... The collar says 'Schrö'!
Oh, wow, what a relief.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_020.text:
It appears identical to
the one named Dinger.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_030.text: Well, they are the same cat, after all. There's two of them, yet just one. Dead, yet living. Existing, yet not.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_040.text:
How do these cats fit with
your research ambitions?

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_050.text:
The fact they exist as a single cat and yet
two cats means they exist in a quantum state—
and are therefore connected at a quantum-
mechanical level.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_070.text:
I think we're doing something like trying to
control their state with orichalcum—to find out
if it's structured in a way that we can extract
energy from them without it diminishing?

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_080.text:
All this tells me is that you have
no idea what you're talking about.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_090.text:
Ha ha! Oh, I don't have the faintest
idea about most of this stuff.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_100.text:
Regardless, we have captured
both quantum cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_110.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_110.text:
And it appears that the
monsters have disappeared.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_120.text:
Indeed they have. This is because
the influence of the cats' quantum
field has dissipated.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_130.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_130.text:
Hail, quantum cat. While not interesting
enough for my purposes, you are a
fascinating creature in your own right.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_140.text:
I'll go back to the lab and
drop off the cat... Er, or cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_160.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_160.text: Perhaps I should return as well.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_000.text:
These mimetic monsters do not
much resemble cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_010.text:
Yes, they seem to be projecting their
existence through space-time? That's why
it changes their left-right directionality.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_020.text:
We speak of the cats in the multiple,
but in truth, they're singular.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_030.text: And it's possible that anyone other than the two of us would actually perceive us as cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_040.text:
I am all the more intrigued
to behold one now.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_000.text:
May I assume that was one
of your mimetic monsters?

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_010.text:
It sure was. Now let's get moving
and find those quantum cats!

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_020.text:
Is there no treat we could dangle that
might lure these creature to us?

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_030.text:
A cat treat? Uh, I dunno.
What sort of treats do aliens like?

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_040.text:
I am no alien cat.
I am the Dismal King.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_000.text:
Guess that was one of those
mimetic monsters, eh?

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_010.text:
It sure was. Now let's get moving
and find those quantum cats!

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_020.text:
You seem quite determined not
to be scolded by your superior.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_030.text:
Oh, you have no idea.
She is terrifying.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_000.text:
Guess that was one of those
mimetic monsters, eh?

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_010.text:
The cats really did manage to project
their appearance onto the monsters...

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_020.text: It makes me wonder if quantum cats are simply creatures onto which normal cats have projected their appearances.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_030.text:
Truly these are no normal cats,
to have deceived the Dismal King so!

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_040.text:
It sure is fun to think about what
they might really look like, though!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_000.text: Did you deliver the quantum cats?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_010.text:
I did, thanks to you. Now our biological
research can move forward without issue.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Yes, I quite enjoyed myself.
Farewell to you, Mags.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_030.text:
But, um, seeing as you were such a helpful
alien, do you think I could maybe ask you
for another favor? I mean, if I need it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_040.text:
If your proposition intrigues me,
the Dismal King will consider it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_000.text: A passcode? Where did you get that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_030.text:
That's a passcode for unlocking one of
the cryosleep pods on the lower floor—
and a rather old one, at that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Pod 007, is it? Yes, it seems a patient in that
pod has been waiting for a medical treatment
to be developed since...cycle 31!? By atoms,
it must be one of the progenitors!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_060.text:
A member of the generation that established
Delta Base. Why, someone from that time would
likely know the answers to all the great
mysteries of this place!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_070.text:
The great mysteries of Delta Base?
Now this is a topic I would care
to hear more about.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_080.text:
May I take this code, alien? A medical treatment
for this patient's condition has long since been
developed, but I don't dare thaw a progenitor
without first informing the Council of Overseers.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Please, alien. Give me the code.
You've been quite helpful so far,
and it would sadden me if I had
to take it from you by force.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_100.text:
As it has no value to me, you may take it.
But in exchange, I demand you tell me
the location of this capsule. Make not that face! Surely you did not
expect great boons from the Dismal King
without presenting something in exchange?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_110.text:
All right. We'll consider it a reward
for your prompt cooperation.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_010_CUT_000_010.text:
It would be trivial for a man of my
ability to defrost a cryosleep capsule.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_010_CUT_000_030.text: No. I will leave it be.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Man_Overworld_Battle
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Nnngh... Is this...a cryopod?
Ah, I see. I've finally awakened.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Man_Overworld_Battle
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I'll not let you dastards have your way!
Not now, and not ever!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_030.text: Well, he certainly left in a hurry.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_040.text:
Aaah ha ha ha! This promises to be
a riveting development indeed!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_050.text: What in the...? Pod 007 is open!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_060.text: And it's empty! What's going on!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_080.text:
I expect our 'progenitor' will inflict a
great deal of darkness upon this world!
Aaah ha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_000.text:
Have you made a decision in
regards to the progenitor capsule?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_010.text:
Sadly, the progenitor escaped
the pod and is currently missing. I don't suppose YOU know
anything about this, alien?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_030.text:
A shame. For if we do not find the progenitor
soon, their ailment will progress to the point
where treatment is no longer possible.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_040.text:
That is concerning. You had best
strive to find the man soon.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_050.text:
Mmm. If they are ultimately able
to locate this progenitor,
it could prove...problematic.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_000.text: It seems I am no longer alone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_010.text:
The cryosleep pod of a progenitor?
Boy, you've really poked the damn
hornet's nest this time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_020.text:
This could threaten everything
that Delta Base has become.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_030.text:
And yet, the person inside that pod could be
the only living witness to Delta Base's history.
Their cultural and historical value is a thing
beyond all measure!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_040.text:
Which is why I propose that the
Council of Overseers leave them
frozen here indefinitely.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_060.text:
Then Administrative Division will
take the appropriate measures.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_070.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_070.text:
Understood. I will see to it that
their cryosleep is not interrupted.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_080.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_080.text:
I have also changed the passcode
as a security precaution.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_090.text:
They changed the passcode?
Then there is nothing more
of interest to me here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_000.text:
You're the one who was in
the cryosleep capsule, yes?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_010.speaker: Man_Overworld_Battle
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_010.text:
And you are the one who awakened me.
You have my thanks, for at long last,
I can now resume my work.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_020.text:
That is the connectivity gate.
Where do you intend to go?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_030.speaker: Man_Overworld_Battle
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_030.text:
To the Conjoined Worlds,
where my task awaits me!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_000.text: What manner of activity happens here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_010.text:
Ah, the alien. Thankfully, we have a researcher
whose duties include interfacing with those
from outside the division, so let me just... Oh, bother. I don't see her anywhere. Tsk!
Well then, I guess it falls to me, the
overseer of the entire Green Division,
to assuage your idle curiosity... Joy.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, you're polite for an alien. Okay,
so we here in Green Division research life.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_040.text:
Our field is a broad one, spanning everything
from the life-forms that live here on Delta Base
to the interdimensional beings that exist in
the space between worlds.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_050.text:
We cover everything from organic chemistry to
life sciences to particle physics, and demand
an incredibly wide breadth of knowledge—
certainly the largest in all of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_060.text:
Then you yourselves must be among
this world's finest specimens.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_070.text:
Yes, every member of Green Division
is an exceptional researcher!
Well, save for a small few.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_080.text:
Now then, alien. As we have valuable research
samples under our care, I would ask you not
to go traipsing about the area.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_090.text:
Alternatively, if you would consent to our
examining you, injecting you with chemicals,
and then dissecting you, I'm certain there's
much of interest we could learn.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_100.text:
Do not presume yourselves capable
of comprehending the Dismal King.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_110.text: Yes, yes. Whatever you say, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_000.text: Oops! Oh dear, I'm so sorry!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_010.text:
You seem in quite a panic.
Is something the matter?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh, it's nothing. Or, well... Okay, here it is: on the lower level, we're
currently cultivating and researching these
otherworldly vegetables called monophids
that we use to make food and medicine.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Do otherworldly vegetables somehow
differ from the conventional kind?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, very much so. In fact, you have to
be REALLY careful with the type and
amount of fertilizer you give them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_070.text:
But I sort of...didn't do that?
And now they've turned into monsters
that are propagating exponentially.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Considering their current rate of growth,
they'll soon overrun the entire lower level!
And if Green Division's overseer happens
to find out about this...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_100.text: Eep! Could you not freak me out even more than I already am, please? I can't even imagine what she'll do! Last time I messed up, she injected me with an experimental mushroom extract that was supposed to let you go days without sleep! And the time before that, she... Well, you get the idea.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_110.text:
But say, you're an alien, right? Would you 
be willing to help me exterminate our now
rapidly expanding monophid population?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_120.text: Yes, I could help with that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Thank you so much! Oh, and I should mention
that the monophids have developed an abnormal
property in which they scream when they perceive
danger. So, um, be careful of that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_140.text:
I must confess that encountering a
radically new type of plant species
sounds rather entertaining.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_150.text:
There won't be anything entertaining about
it at all! In fact, according to past records,
all the research teams that tried to deal with
such infestations suffered massive casualties.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Still, if we could emit something at the same
wavelength as the monophids' screams,
we might be able to cancel them out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_170.text:
That is fine, I suppose—although I do
wish to hear their screams at least once.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_000.text: So these are your monophids. Mmm.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_010.text:
That scream makes my brain feel like
it's being stabbed with an ice pick!
Does it not affect you!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Their lithe, reddish bodies...
Their horrid, piercing screams...
I daresay these plants are even
more adorable than I anticipated!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_010.text:
They are indeed screaming,
but it appears to be canceled out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_020.text: We should be able to gather them now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_000.text:
Here is the first bundle of monophids.
What will you do with them now?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_010.text:
Screaming aside, monophids have a lot
of vitality—and their seeds are quite
rich in various nutrients.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_020.text:
So if they fail to heed you,
they will be rent asunder?
The Dismal King approves!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, this time it was my own dumb fault
for messing up the fertilizer. And the
reproductivity was probably a result of
all the selective breeding! Heh heh...heh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_040.text:
But do you know why Green Division is
trying to uncover the secrets of life?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_080.text:
Even if they did find some way,
it'd probably require a weird surgery.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_090.text:
Your overseer would certainly
not balk at such.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_100.text:
Nooo, don't even joke about that!
Let's just hurry on, okay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_000.text:
These monophids are certainly
making their voices heard.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Even when I know it's coming,
it still disturbs me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I will strive to harvest them
before you collapse.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_010.text:
Hey, so don't let anyone know
I told you this, but...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_030.text:
As far as I know, this is the first time
we've dealt with an outsider like you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_040.text:
But on the lower level, there's apparently
someone who isn't a member of Green Division
or any other division!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_050.text:
Like a ghost or something, I guess.
And while I kind of want to see them,
I also kind of...don't?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_060.text:
Should you not confirm this
with your own eyes?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_070.text:
Ew, no! I just want to get the last monophids
before the ghost appears.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_080.text:
Then if I see the ghost,
I will let you know.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_010.text:
You know, I think there's a part of
me that's starting to enjoy this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_020.text:
I didn't want to mention this earlier,
but a colleague of mine was actually
killed by one of the monophids.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_030.text:
Their song is filled with sweet darkness—
too much for a human to endure, perhaps,
but it resonates with me most deeply.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_040.text:
Huh. I kinda undersold how bad it was so
you wouldn't be worried, but I guess since
that stuff doesn't affect aliens like you,
I didn't need to bother.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_050.text:
I am the Dismal King.
Nothing you say can worry me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_000.text: That is the last of the monophids.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_010.text:
Well, I've got a lot of processing to do
on these guys, so I'm going to head back
to the upper level. Thanks again, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_030.text: Perhaps I should return as well.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_000.text:
Thank you so much for helping me
with that whole monophid thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_010.text:
We only managed to recover one of them,
but that's still one more than none!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_020.text:
Um, so if anything else goes wrong,
can I ask for your help again?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_030.text:
If your proposition intrigues me,
I will consider it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_040.text:
Thanks. Oh, and here's your reward
for helping me out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_051_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_051_CUT_000_010.text:
We managed to recover two monophids.
That's wonderful!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_052_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_052_CUT_000_010.text:
We recovered all the monophids,
which should ensure that we're able
to go forward with our research.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_010.text:
Sadly, we had to eradicate all the monophids,
but I'll try to recover the specimens from
the carcasses; we grew them in good soil,
so even dead, they're full of nutrients.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_040.text:
I guess this turned out to be more about
exterminating monophids than recovering them.
But hey, you still get a reward for that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_000.text: What manner of activity happens here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, look. It's the alien. We in Green Division perform cutting-edge
research spanning everything from the life
sciences to quantum mechanics, and our new
research project is already well underway.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_020.text:
Does it involve a life-form appealing
enough to pluck at my heartstrings?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_030.text:
The research of fiends, monsters,
and the like falls under the purview
of Red Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_040.text:
We in Green Division collect unusual life-forms
from various worlds, as well as flora and fauna
with medicinal properties. We also pursue
research into the fundaments of life itself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_050.text:
But our research is not merely academic
in nature; we are equally devoted to
researching practical ways to improve
the quality of life here in Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_060.text:
Then you yourselves must be among
this world's finest specimens.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_070.text:
Quite right. Green Division's researchers
are the best of the best, and they undertake
their work with meticulous care.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_080.text:
Now then, alien. As we have valuable research
samples under our care, I would ask you not
to go traipsing about the area.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_090.text:
In fact, I'm planning to begin an experiment
involving some new specimens shortly—
assuming they ever arrive, that is.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_100.text: I do hope there hasn't been another mistake. Ugh. I've half a mind to make a research specimen out of her one of these days...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_110.text:
Alternatively, if you would consent to our
examining you, injecting you with chemicals,
and then dissecting you, I'm certain there's
much of interest we could learn.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_120.text:
Do not presume yourselves capable
of comprehending the Dismal King.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_130.text: Yes, yes. Whatever you say, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Forgive me. It appears
I have broken your jar.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh no! They escaped!
The tsuchinoko have escaped!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I'm not surprised you
haven't heard of them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_070.text:
They're a precious life-form—also known as
bachi-hebi—which are regarded as obscure or
even mythical on multiple worlds. As you might
guess, specimens are very difficult to obtain.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Then I apologize again for causing you
to drop such invaluable specimens.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Here's the thing: I'm a researcher for
Green Division, and if the overseer were
to learn that I lost our tsuchinoko...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Yes, exactly! The other day, she almost made
me do a gene transplant with an electric eel!
Er, but I guess that's beside the point.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_120.text:
So will you please help me recover
those tsuchinoko? I mean, it WAS
kind of your fault, after all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_130.text:
There were three specimens in the jar,
and they probably fled to the lower level.
Don't worry, I'll come with you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Also, tsuchinoko snore when they sleep,
so that'll be the easiest time to try
and recapture them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Here, let me activate that
lift over there for you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Take your ease, Mags. I assure you
that we will locate them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_030.text:
No way we're catching it
without a fight now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_040.text: Should we still go for it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_030.text: This is our chance to catch it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_010.text:
But we still have two to go.
I'm counting on you, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_020.text:
What do you intend to do
with these creatures?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Never mind, doesn't matter. But listen,
do you find it at all strange that these
creatures are called tsuchinoko even in
totally different worlds?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_040.text:
You claim these creatures exist with
the same name in multiple worlds?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_050.text:
Yeah, exactly! Isn't that weird? I mean,
'cause there aren't any records of anyone
here releasing them into another world.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_060.text:
I suppose they might jump into other dimensions
when they sense danger? I mean, that would also
explain why we haven't been able to get accurate
data on their native habitat or population.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_070.text:
A fascinating theory—but one that
does not explain why they are called
'tsuchinoko' in multiple worlds. Could there be some force capable of
regulating such things? Dare I postulate
that there exists...a Conjoined King?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_080.text:
Well, perhaps our habit of calling them tsuchinoko
spread to other worlds—or maybe a member of the
civilization that named them found their way here.
Either explanation could work, honestly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_090.text:
And if some sort of internal organ allows them to
jump between dimensions instead of magic or tech,
it would be possible for the same population to
exist on multiple worlds at once.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_100.text:
You posit that these creatures contain
world-hopping mechanisms within them?
Now that would make for an appealing
life-form indeed!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_110.text:
If the same individual tsuchinoko truly did
exist on multiple worlds at once, that would
make them living, breathing, interdimensional
teleportation devices!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_120.text:
And THAT means researching their species
could provide valuable clues for the
development of teleportation technology!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_130.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_130.text:
It has become clear why you are pursuing
these creatures with such vim and vigor.
Truly, you Green Division researchers
are at the cutting edge of science!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_140.text:
Aw, thank you so much
for saying that! You know, if we ever do get our
interdimensional teleportation up
and running, I'd love to visit your
world one day, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_150.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_150.text: It would be my pleasure to escort you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_160.text:
Also, I know I'm always going on about
myself, but I really would like to hear
more about your world next time!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_010_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_120_CUT_010_000.text:
How I would like to claim
their vitality for myself!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_000.text: That looks to be a tsuchinoko.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_030.text:
No way we're catching this
guy without a fight now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_210_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_210_CUT_000_000.text: That is a tsuchinoko, is it not?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_210_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_210_CUT_000_030.text: This is our chance to grab it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_000.text:
We captured the tsuchinoko.
I find it to be quite the
appealing little creature.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_010.text: But there is still one to go.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_040.text:
So, um, alien? Were you serious about
wanting to keep one of these?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_050.text:
Oh yes. In fact, I can hardly contain
my interest! A creature with such vast
power would doubtless prove a worthy
addition to my thralls.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_060.text:
I see. Sadly, these specimens are very precious
to us, so we can't let you take one with you.
Also, no photographs, flash or otherwise.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_070.text: I will obey your rules...for now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_080.text:
Er, are you all right, alien?
You're mumbling. A lot.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_300_CUT_000_030.text:
No way we're catching it
without a fight now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_310_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_310_CUT_000_030.text:
Then this could be our
chance to catch it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_000.text:
We've captured the final tsuchinoko.
I trust this concludes our business here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_010.text:
Yep! We're all done. Now I'm gonna
run on up and get these processed,
so I'll see you later.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_000.text:
Thanks again for your help
with the tsuchinoko.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_010.text:
I did enjoy our encounter with the creatures.
Their tactile sensations were a delight:
soft, smooth, and pliable to a degree
unlike anything else I've experienced.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_030.text: So what has become of them?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_000.text:
We were able to capture all
three in healthy condition.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_010.text:
We're fortunate they are
such sound sleepers.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_020.text:
I'm just glad our research into the life
of the tsuchinoko can proceed smoothly.
Thanks again for the help!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_000.text:
Not all of them made it
back to us unharmed...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_020.text:
Still, I don't think that should have
a significant effect on our research.
Thank you for your help.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_000.text:
All three of them were
pretty beat up...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_010.text:
What brave creatures, to bare
their fangs at the Dismal King!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_020.text:
Still, it's not like we had a choice,
so thanks all the same, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Thank you for helping to retrieve those
rare specimens, alien. All of us in Green
Division owe you a debt.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Mags informed you of our
little accident, then?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_020.text:
She did—and I apologize for all
the trouble my researcher caused.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Um... Thank you for
your help, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_050.text:
The overseer was quite furious with me.
She made it clear that since my negligence
put all of Delta Base at risk, I should have
reported the incident to her immediately.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_060.text:
On that topic, alien, I wonder if you
might be willing to join us for a
selective-breeding experiment?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Alas for you, the Dismal King is a
flawless being. There is no way to
improve upon me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_080.text:
This is not about breeding you, alien.
We're seeking to fuse the specimens
you helped recover with a magical bee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_090.text:
We intend to fuse their individual
characteristics to create a new
and beneficial life-form.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_100.text: As I would hate for your impression of Green Division to be tainted by certain members of our research team, you may consider this a chance to see the kind of work we really do.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Very well. But be certain this
spectacle is worthy of my time!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_015_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_015_CUT_000_000.text:
Then please go observe our experiment.
You can find it on the lower level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_015_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_07_015_CUT_000_020.text: I will go in due time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Beginning selective-breeding verification
experiment A, iteration 880.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Our goal is to use the inherent abilities
of quantum cats to increase the bee's
propagation rate and honey production.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_020.text:
We once more stand at the brink of
uncovering a core mystery of nature
and enriching our own way of life.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_030.text:
How wonderful that the people of this world
do not resist the temptation of darkness,
but embrace it! It is only a matter of time
before all Delta Base enters the grim abyss.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_040.text:
We can instantly create new life-forms
by combining specimens that have been
placed in these fusion pods.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_050.text:
And by applying our teleportation
technology, we turn them into a
new, single being!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I've begun combining the genetic elements
of the quantum cat and honeybee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_070.text:
When you hear the pod ding,
the work will be complete.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Creature_303
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_140.text:
WE MUST       WE WILL
     TURN THIS   INTO
   NEST

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Oh no... No no no no no... Not good! We overshot the domesticity
level and made it intelligent!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Creature_303
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_160.text:
KREE KREE KREE.
FLEE FROM US.
FLEE. FLEE. FLEE.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_170.text:
So on a scale of complete success to
utter failure... Maybe a six? Anyway, this is getting dangerous!
Let's get out of here!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Aaah ha ha ha ha! Behold as a new
manifestation of the dark is born!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Our goal is to boost the medicinal properties
of monophids and propagation rates of
honeybees, as well as increasing the
yields of honey and so forth.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_060.text:
I've begun combining the genetic
elements of the monophid and honeybee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_010.text:
Our goal is to boost the special faculties of
tsuchinoko and propagation rates of honeybees,
as well as increasing the yields of honey
and so forth.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_060.text:
I've begun combining the genetic elements
of the tsuchinoko and honeybee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_000.text:
I'm not sure what went wrong, but they
appear to have fused into a rather
dangerous-looking creature.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_010.text:
...Mags? What culture solution
did you use in the pods?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_030.text:
My instructions were to use formulation 098.
But sadly, I cannot afford to waste
precious time chastising you now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_040.text:
It is possible the specimens have begun
constructing a hive on the lower floor.
Should they gain even more intelligence,
it could put all of Delta Base in danger.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_050.text:
Also, we need to give our new
life-form a name! Um, right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_060.text:
Our target is a failed experiment officially
designated as 'Rogue Species 303.'
We in Green Division must find some way
to respond to the danger this swarm poses.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_070.text:
Do not be so hasty. A new life-form has been born,
and with it comes opportunity. Surely a study of
the beast will bring you closer to unraveling the
mysteries of existence or some such drivel.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_080.text:
Um, I guess? But if we approach it,
it's gonna eat us, which'll make it
hard to pursue any serious research. But you know, Red Division has experience
dealing with angry, dangerous life-forms.
Maybe they could help us out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_090.text:
*sigh* I suppose Green Division cannot
permit our pride to get in the way of
our greater responsibility. We must confer with Red Division.
Are you up to the task, Mags?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_100.text: Yeah, um, I don't... I mean, I'm not... No? Er, that is to say, I'm not entirely sure I'd be capable of having a productive conversation with Red Division, considering how, you know... scary they are? I mean, they're basically the war division of Delta Base, sooo...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_110.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_110.text: Why are you looking at me?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_120.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_120.text: Very well, alien, the job is yours. Good luck. And as for you, Mags, I expect you to make yourself extremely useful. In the meantime, I will remain here and continue to monitor Rogue Species 303. Dismissed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_000.text:
We have been briefed by Red Division's
overseer. We know Delta Base is in
trouble due to Rogue Species 303.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_010.text:
Um, well, I guess our fusion of a new life-form
miiight have caused some unexpected genes to
manifest? Ones that draw quite strongly from
the honeybee side of its genetic composition?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_020.text:
Green Division researches medicines,
does it not? Have you not developed
magical potions to deal with insects?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_030.text:
Unfortunately, we don't know how a rogue
species might react to insecticide. If we
inadvertently made them stronger, they could
easily end up being completely unmanageable.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_040.text:
Then you've no choice but to pick
them apart bug by bug and leg by leg.
Let us only hope they are challenge
enough to make the endeavor interesting.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_050.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_050.text:
A life-form of this type will have a queen.
Kill this queen. This will stop them.
Their proliferation will cease, halting
any further infiltration of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_060.text:
Yeah, but the thing is, we've yet to...
observe a queen? Or anything like one? I mean, it's also possible our security
cameras are just too far away for us
to make that kind of distinction!
That could be it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_070.text: Then let us take a closer look.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_080.text:
Wait. You should apply pheromones.
This will cause the life-forms to accept
you as an ally.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_090.text:
Good idea! We used formulation 507
for the culture solution, so we should
be able to make a pheromone out of the
monster specimens we derived it from.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_000.text:
I have applied the pheromones.
Rogue Species 303 will now
consider you an ally.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_010.text:
I did not realize pheromones
smelled quite so foul.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, you're not smelling the pheromone!
You're actually smelling the bodily fluids 
of the monster specimen it was derived from. Er, which is its urine.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_030.text:
What an exciting new
experience for me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_040.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_040.text:
Red Division hopes you succeed.
If you do not, we have a failsafe.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_050.text:
If we DO botch this, our standing in
Delta Base would plummet! And since
I'm the one who caused all this trouble,
I'd have no choice but to resign.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_060.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_060.text:
Why do you do this, alien?
This is not your burden.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_070.text:
I care nothing for your standing within
Delta Base, Mags: I simply enjoy the
endless crises in this place. So if this were to result in your world's
utter destruction, there would be one
less joy in my life.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_080.text:
What a peculiar alien.
But I wish you good luck regardless.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_015_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_015_CUT_000_010.text: You face the Dismal King, insect!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_015_CUT_001_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_015_CUT_001_010.text:
Is that all you have?
Entertain me, antennaed one!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_010.text:
The pheromone is tricking
their sensory organs!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_020.text:
You claim they perceive me
as one of their own?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_040.text:
Huh. I guess there's no
queen around here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_016_CUT_001_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_016_CUT_001_010.text:
This pheromone thing's
really doing the trick!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_010.text:
The insects are behaving differently.
Perhaps the pheromone is wearing off?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_040.text:
Mmm. You do a good insect voice.
Who knew you possessed hidden talents?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_000.text:
That should be all of them, but I guess
the queen wasn't here after all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_010.text:
I hear wingbeats. It is likely she
cowers in fear, knowing as she does
the dread might of the Dismal King.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_020.text:
It's the queen! She must have received
a signal that we killed her underlings!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_000.text:
The queen is deposed and slain,
and all her minions along with her.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_010.text:
Thank you for your assistance, alien.
It is much appreciated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_020.text:
And what have you learned of
Rogue Species 303, Mags?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh, tons! And I also documented
everything, of course.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_040.text:
Then perhaps we can consider this
experiment a stepping stone rather
than a failure.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_050.text:
And perhaps next time you might unleash
an even greater darkness into this world!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_080.text:
Er, apologies. It is me. Shi Kat.
I'd hoped you would be more alarmed
by that. How embarrassing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_090.text:
It seems everyone in Delta Base
is skilled at making insect noises.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_100.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_100.text:
I have a message, Madam Overseer.
The other division overseers await
your report on this incident.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_110.text:
Understood. Then I guess this
is farewell for now, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_120.text:
This whole thing was my fault.
I'm so, so, so, SOOO sorry!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_130.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_130.text:
It is a bit disturbing to see you so
uncharacteristically contrite, Mags.
Has your cruel overseer forced you
to drink more experimental medicine?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_140.text:
Oh, you noticed that too, alien?
Yeah, my boss sorta...ordered me
to apologize to you? But now that everything worked out,
I don't regret a thing. Plus, I'm sure
all the excitement has made your visit
to Delta Base really fun!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_150.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_150.text:
Oh, I certainly have enjoyed myself—and it
feels divine to help draw Delta Base ever
closer to the seductive charm of the dark!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_160.text:
Yeah, I'm not really into the spooky stuff,
so I don't really get what you mean. But it's
dark on the lower level—AND a total mess—so
I hope you find what you need there. Good luck!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_170.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_170.text:
Imagine not understanding
the appeal of darkness...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_000.text:
I understand you've had to endure much
due to Mags's procedural and general
incompetence, alien, and I apologize.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_010.text:
Not at all. And if I may, I believe Delta
Base is well on its way to becoming a more
appealing place due to your efforts.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_020.text:
Speaking of life on Delta Base,
you'd be welcome in Green Division
should you choose to remain here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_030.text:
But on another topic, while we were dealing
with this latest incident, we learned there
is an individual confined on the lower level—
one that might even be an alien like yourself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_040.text:
Someone else who came through the door?
I hope for your sake this is not some scheme
to trap me down there.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_050.text:
For Green Division's part, we have only
gratitude for your work here and wouldn't
dream of apprehending you. But I can't speak to the plans of
the other divisions, so it would
behoove you to show caution.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_060.text:
Regardless, I will make arrangements
for you to meet this other alien.
Whether or not you do so is up to you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I am not 'alien.'
I am the Dismal King.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, hell! Sorry about that—didn't mean
to offend. In fact, I've actually been
waiting for you to show up! So this is the research area of Red Division.
I'm the division overseer, and this is my
data-management specialist, Shi Kat.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_030.text: You have been waiting for me? Mmm.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Relax, alien! We'll get to that. Right then! So Red Division is currently
engaged in the collection of life-form data
from numerous worlds. Dangerous life-forms
in particular. Monsters, essentially.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_050.text: See, the examiners and researchers of Delta Base have been dispatched to all sorts of worlds filled with all kinds of nasty, toothy monsters. It's Red Division's job to gather data about said monsters and come up with countermeasures—and let me tell you, there is a ton of data to wrangle.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I am Shi Kat. The data-wrangler.
The pitiless overseer is constantly
increasing my workload. I cannot begin
to estimate when I might be finished.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Ha ha ha! C'mon now, Kat! Let's not go
airing our dirty laundry to the alien! Now where was I...? Oh, right! Data. Yeah,
so once you understand a monster's nature,
you'll know whether fight or flight is the
best choice, and also how best to go about it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Unknown monsters. Fiends. Phantoms.
These do we analyze. These do we classify.
There is science in turning knowledge
into usable data.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_090.text:
We're well aware, thank you! *sigh*
Sorry about that, alien. My colleague
here tends to be a bit thickheaded.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_100.text:
You say you were waiting for me.
Therefore, I expect you to beg
a boon of the Dismal King.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Oh, right! That! Okay, so when you
showed up here, it actually triggered
a momentary power failure that wiped out
vital portions of our monster-data library.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_120.text:
I will strive to be more
careful in the future.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Careful isn't gonna cut it, alien!
We had some very important data go
right out the window because of you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Anyway, since this is all your fault,
we need you to go to the lower level
and track down the biochip that has
our backup monster data on it. All we know is that it's inside a container,
but just open 'em all and I'm sure you'll
eventually run across it. Good? Good.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_150.text:
We can restore the erased
data with that biochip.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_160.text:
I'll give you permission to take the lift
to the lower level. Oh, but be careful down
there! The electromagnetic gates have sorta
been on the fritz lately.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_170.text:
I suppose you will claim this
to be my fault as well?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Aren't you a sharp one! So here's the deal:
that gate delivers a massively painful
and dangerous electrical shock whenever
something touches it. We built the thing in case any of our
nastier research specimens ever got out.
Can't be too careful, am I right!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_190.text:
Your rambling appeal holds little interest for
me, but I can ill afford to have my reputation
as the Dismal King besmirched by your
baseless accusations.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_200.text:
Right? Better hop to it, then!
And remember, safety first!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh hey, the biochip! Nice going!
Now we can restore that missing data.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_010.text:
You're just as good as I'd hoped, alien.
I knew you could do it.
