SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Your pathetic errands are a trivial
matter to the Dismal King.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Ha ha ha! Man, what a sap. Now let's see
what details of the alien's physiology 
were collected by the biochip.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_050.text:
It would seem he's far more
compatible than anticipated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Ho there, alien! Boy, you really have
a knack for showing up exactly when
I want you to. I love it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Let me guess: you intend to waste my
time with more tedious busywork.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_02.text:
You know it! When we reviewed our newest
data, we learned that some information
regarding Monster Specimen 056 was lost.
Kat here can fill you in on the details.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_03.text:
You will kindly battle Specimen 056.
As you do, we will collect its data. You are the only one who can do this.
We require first-encounter data.
But every Red Division member has
already battled Specimen 056.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_04.text:
And there you have it! We've got Specimen 056
locked in a pen in the lower level, so just
get down there and get to thrashing it! Oh, and Kat? You're wrong about one thing:
there IS a member of Red Division who has
yet to fight the beast...and you know
JUST who I mean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_05.text:
I cannot fight the beast. I would be slain
before any useful data could be collected.
Please go in my place, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Then I shall demonstrate to you the
power I command as the Dismal King!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Ha ha! Wonderful! You've met my
expectations once again, alien. Anyway, we'll handle all the data collection
and numbers and all that nerd stuff, so you
just worry about the fighting. Good? Good.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I apologize for your being troubled on my behalf. 
Also, you should know this: Specimen 056 was not
captured in the wild. Instead, it was created in
a joint project with Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_09.text:
You created a monster specifically
so you might slay it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_10.text:
Nothing so scandalous. We create monsters to
isolate and extract beneficial characteristics.
Also for potential domestication.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Yes, yes, it's all simply fascinating.
Now enough with the idle chitchat!
Let's get on with the fighting!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_12.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_12.text: You are so eager to behold my strength?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_13.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_13.text:
Buddy, I'm eager for DAYS.
Now c'mon! Get to the slaying!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_00.text:
This appears to be the enclosure
that confines Specimen 056.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Right you are! Now get in there and smack
the thing in the face a few times so we
can finally complete our database, 'kay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_02.text:
C'mon, alien! Let's see some enthusiasm!
Hup, hup! Hoo-rah! Get 'er done!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_03.text:
That man does not possess one shred of
the dignity that befits a ruler of men.
That said, he certainly is cheerful.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_04.text:
He is no ruler, alien, but an overseer.
Now good luck on your fight.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh, well DONE, alien! I knew you wouldn't
let me down! Now we've got all the data
we need for Specimen 056!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_01.text:
Now get the data restored
already, Kat! Hop to it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_03.text:
...For all his supposed compatibility,
he'd be useless to us if he couldn't
survive a battle of that intensity—so
I'm VERY glad to see he passed the test.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_04.text:
Still, the other divisions don't seem to know
what we're attempting here—or maybe they do
and are just granting consent through silence? Eh, whatever. He's my alien now,
and I'll do whatever I want with him.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_06.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_06.text:
What are you muttering about?
Has something happened?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_07.text:
Gah! You're still heeeeee...er, yes!
I'm certainly happy to see you, alien!
I've a little reward for you since
you went and recovered that data.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_08.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_08.text:
You take advantage of the Dismal King at your
own peril, human—we shall see how long that
cheerfulness of yours persists afterward.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_09.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_09.text:
And now, I shall continue to enjoy
this world for a while longer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_02.text:
You know it! When we reviewed our newest
data, we learned that some information
regarding Monster Specimen 098 was lost.
Kat here can fill you in on the details.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_03.text:
You will kindly battle Specimen 098.
As you do, we will collect its data. You are the only one who can do this.
We require first-encounter data.
But every Red Division member has
already battled Specimen 098.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_04.text:
And there you have it! We've got Specimen 098
locked in a pen in the lower level, so just
get down there and get to thrashing it! Oh, and Kat? You're wrong about one thing:
there IS a member of Red Division who has
yet to fight the beast...and you know
JUST who I mean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I apologize for your being troubled on my behalf. 
Also, you should know this: Specimen 098 was not
captured in the wild. Instead, it was created in
a joint project with Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_00.text:
This appears to be the enclosure
that confines Specimen 098.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Right you are—and we REALLY need
you to fight it so we can get our
first-encounter data.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_02.text:
I mean, you know how it is when there's a
gap in consecutively numbered files, right?
Drives you crazy!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_03.text:
Yes, true beauty lies in perfection.
This I know well.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh, well DONE, alien! I knew you wouldn't
let me down! Now we've got all the data
we need for Specimen 098!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_02.text:
You know it! When we reviewed our newest
data, we learned that some information
regarding Monster Specimen 507 was lost.
Kat here can fill you in on the details.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_03.text:
You will kindly battle Specimen 507.
As you do, we will collect its data. You are the only one who can do this.
We require first-encounter data.
But every Red Division member has
already battled Specimen 507.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_04.text:
And there you have it! We've got Specimen 507
locked in a pen in the lower level, so just
get down there and get to thrashing it! Oh, and Kat? You're wrong about one thing:
there IS a member of Red Division who has
yet to fight the beast...and you know
JUST who I mean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I apologize for your being troubled on my behalf. 
Also, you should know this: Specimen 507 was not
captured in the wild. Instead, it was created in
a joint project with Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_00.text:
This appears to be the enclosure
that confines Specimen 507.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Right you are! Now get in there and smack
the thing in the face a few times so we
can finally complete our database, 'kay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_02.text:
Exactly how many of these
specimens do you have?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_03.text:
Our numbering system is not indicative
of the total. Specimens are destroyed.
New varieties are discovered—including
cursed and artificially developed ones. I estimate there are roughly 75,000 in all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_04.text:
Mmm. That number may include some
monsters with which even I am unfamiliar.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_05.text:
Beginning to take an interest in our work,
eh, alien? Well, Kat is correct: we've tens
of thousands of samples, each one a precious
treasure that's indispensable to our research!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh, well DONE, alien! I knew you wouldn't
let me down! Now we've got all the data
we need for Specimen 507!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Ho there, alien! Boy, am I ever in awe of
your knack for appearing at the right place
and at the right time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Do you need more monster
data recovered, perhaps?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Not exactly. See, while we were attempting
to update our combat data on a particular
specimen, we experienced an unexpected
infestation of parasitic slime mold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_04.text:
The slime mold is consuming all of our
monster specimens AND multiplying
at an almost unbelievable rate.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Thing is, most of Red Division has been sent
offworld on official business, and we don't
have the strength to fight it. And yeah, sure, we could ask the
other divisions for help, but yuck!
Who wants to do that? Not me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_06.text: So you seek my aid instead.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Exactly. You're the man, alien!
Er, or the alien, I guess.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I'm currently working up an analysis of the
slime mold's properties that I should have
finished up here shortly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_09.text:
So you're going to help us, right?
Sure you are!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, alien? How about it?
Will you help us?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_01.text:
We have come to understand a few
aspects of the slime mold's nature.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_02.text:
We can obstruct its movements
with our electromagnetic gates.
These gates have been activated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_03.text:
You can deactivate individual gates
by using switches near containers.
However, they cannot be reactivated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_04.text:
Okay, so our sensors picked up three swarms
of slimes. Or packs. Or, uh, whatever slimes
travel around in. Herds, maybe? Oh, and when this is all over,
there's a reward waiting for you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_05.text:
I look forward to discovering
what that might be.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_07.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_07.text:
Exactly as I said. Now as for how
to deal with this slime mold...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_09.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_09.text: I will clear out the slime mold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, this is just strange...
We've never seen this particular
variety of slime mold before!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_030_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_030_CUT_000_01.text: This should be the last of 'em!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierZ
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_00.text:
This slime mold looks like your everyday
garden-variety stuff, but it's actually
some sort of new species or subspecies.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_01.text:
A discovery of this nature must be
reported to the other divisions.
This is correct, yes?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_02.text:
Oh, Kat! You and your rules! Look, involving the other divisions
is only going to complicate things.
Bureaucracy, paperwork, infighting...
Blech, am I right!? I'll just handle it myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_03.text:
Cease your dissension, divisionist!
Your overseer has a plan, and it
must be followed to the letter!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_04.text:
Wait, seriously? Ha ha! I didn't expect
an outsider to back my play like that,
but I sure as hell appreciate it! See, you gotta understand that there are
all sorts of tensions between divisions,
and I don't want 'em to see us as weak.
But clearly you get that, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_00.text:
We believe the slime mold has emerged from
the containment unit of Specimen 440,
Mr. Overseer, sir!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_01.text:
Specimen 440... Yes, of course.
Exactly as I suspected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_02.text:
The containment unit has been destroyed from
the inside, sir, and the slime mold seems to have
been feeding off of the specimen it contained.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_03.text:
We must report this at once.
Yellow Division must know.
Green Division must know.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_04.text:
Slow down there, speedy!
We'll hold off on that report until we've
had time to conduct a full investigation.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_05.text:
Tell me the significance
of Specimen 440.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_06.text:
Well, I suppose you've earned
a few answers, my alien friend. Right as you arrived here, Specimen 440
woke up. But just as we were getting
ready to analyze its combat potential,
the slime mold infestation began.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_07.text:
We naturally suspected that your arrival
was connected to Specimen 440, but needed
actual evidence this was the case. And guess what? We were right!
The two are most definitely related.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_08.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_08.text:
The slime mold may have been awakened
by the presence of my dark energy.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_09.text:
Actually, we've been watching to see if
the slime mold reacts to your presence,
and so far that's a big fat negatory.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_10.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_10.text:
Anyway, that's why we're going to need your
continued participation for just a teensy
bit longer! You're good with that, right?
Sure you are.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_11.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_11.text:
I will accompany you until
you are satisfied.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierX
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_00.text:
Sir, none of the characteristics of this
infestation match the data of known slime
molds in our database. I feel it would be
best to inform the other divisions.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_01.text:
I understand, soldier—well,
in the sense I acknowledge that
as your personal point of view.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_02.text:
Uh, thank you, sir? So should I issue
an official interdivisional report?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_05.text:
440 is a unique specimen,
and I'm not going to let the other
divisions start meddling with it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_06.text:
Why, if the specimen was destroyed,
all of my amazing plans for it
would amount to nothing!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_07.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_07.text:
It is my fervent hope that your
plans succeed, Overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_08.text: Thanks, alien. That means a lot.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_00.text:
The slime molds are entering
the containment unit.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_01.text:
I've confirmed the presence of Specimen 440.
Looks like that damn slime mold destroyed
the containment unit from the inside and
consumed all of its bodily tissue!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_02.text: This unit is full of slime mold?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_03.text:
This unit contains a mummified human male.
The slime mold seems to be functioning as
tentacular appendages that are providing
nutrition to the mummy.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_04.text:
A human that lives on in a mummified state,
preserved only by nutrition absorbed
through slime mold? Fascinating. Is he using the mold to cling desperately
to life? Or is the mold denying the sweet
release of death the mummy yearns for?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_05.text:
The slime mold activity was a clear sign
the mummy was preparing to rise from its
slumber—we just didn't expect it to happen
so dang quickly! Ugh. What a pain.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_06.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_06.text: Is this not all part of the plan?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_07.text:
I wish! But no, totally unrelated.
We need to bring that slime mold under
control, which means we have to fight
the thing again.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_00.text:
Okay! The slime mold has been brought
under control, which means we can
finally resume the experiment.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_01.text: I gather you require fresh combat data?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_02.text:
Oh, I DO so appreciate how much
of my time you save with your
quick grasp of these situations! Er, but if you're not willing to fight,
I'll have to make Shi Kat do it instead.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_04.text:
Oh, I know I wouldn't get the results
I wanted when poor Shi Kat was inevitably
turned into a pulsating pile of goo—but
I bet I'd end up with SOMETHING!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_05.text:
An intriguing prospect, but perhaps
one best saved for another occasion.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_06.text:
I'm going to take that as a yes.
Now come on, alien! Hop to it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_00.text:
As always, alien, I'm grateful for your
cooperation. Let's start the experiment!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_01.text:
This could lead to another slime mold
infestation. We should enlist the
assistance of Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Mr. Kat, did I just hear you volunteer to help
us gather combat data in the alien's stead?
I mean, you ARE a member of Red Division,
so that would be the more preferable outcome.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_03.text:
No, Overseer. I said nothing.
Good luck to you, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Right then! Let me start by explaining the
properties of the slime mold. Basically,
they function as a colony with the ability to
mimic the appearance and behaviors of a host.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_05.text:
You appear to know a great
deal about slime mold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_06.text:
I know it because I was the one
who discovered this species! See, the objective of this experiment isn't just
to gather combat data: it's a second attempt at
an experiment I conducted over 3,000 cycles ago—
one thought to have ended in failure!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_07.text:
The goal of that experiment was to acquire
stronger bodies by using parasitic slime
molds that could consume, fuse with,
and gain the powers of their hosts. We theorized that a host possessed of a
powerful will might be able to gain the
slime's powers while still retaining their
own autonomy after being consumed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_08.text:
But the experiment ended in failure,
and the test specimen was sealed away
inside this capsule. He is known as the Beast King—number 440.
We'd worked together as researchers countless
times, and he was the only member of Red Division
I ever considered to be a partner.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_09.text:
So these are the mummified remains of
a human man called 'the Beast King.'

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_10.text:
You're strong—so strong, in fact, that when
the slime mold attempts to take control of you,
you might be powerful enough to resist it and
gain its ability for yourself! Also, if you end up being taken over by the
slime, the Beast King will be free of its
control and come back to life. See? Win-win!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_11.text: I see now the darkness within you clearly. Whatever happens, an objective of yours will be met. But the objective you truly care about—the revival of the Beast King—will not.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_12.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_12.text:
Specimen 440 is a colony of slime mold.
It is not the Beast King.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_13.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_13.text:
Silence, insect! What do you know of the
Beast King and slime mold!? Nothing! Oh, but don't worry, alien! Should you
end up being consumed by the slime mold,
you'll just live on in a mummified form!
Pretty neat, right? SO neat!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_14.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_14.text:
You must escape at once, alien.
The overseer's behavior has
become dangerously erratic.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_15.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_15.text:
You speak to the Dismal King, insect!
All who wish to become a part of me
are accepted into my fell darkness,
be they slime mold or man.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_16.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_16.text:
Aaah ha ha ha! I LOVE it, alien!
You have such AMBITION! Now go! Do it! Fight that slime
mold and GIVE IT ALL YA GOT!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_17.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_17.text:
You are certain, alien?
Then I will do it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_18.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_18.text:
Oh, I'll do it, all right...
And there we go. Capsule open!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_19.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_19.text:
I sense a deep miasma around you,
Beast King. So come! Step forth
and join your darkness to mine!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_20.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_20.text:
What!? No! Stop, you stupid slime!
You're supposed to attack the alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_21.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_21.text:
It flees the Dismal King?
What is the meaning of this!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_22.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_22.text:
Specimen 440 is moving to another part
of the base. I speculate it is seeking
more suitable prey.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_23.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_23.text:
No! No, that's not it at ALL! Don't you see!? It's him! It's the Beast King!
He's looking for his beloved sword!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_01.text:
He has been arrested by decree of
our division council, and will likely
be dismissed from his duties soon.
I have been appointed acting overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_03.text:
We activated the electromagnetic gate
to keep it contained, but do not know
how long it will hold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_04.text:
A portion of the slime mold managed to slip
through the gate before it was activated.
We do not know its present location.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_05.text:
To think it would refuse my embrace!
The overseer said it fled in search
of a beloved sword, yes? Explain this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_06.text:
That sword is an artifact. 
Yellow Division is in charge of artifacts.
We should contact them about this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_00.text:
The electronic gate to the monster pens
has been broken. This is likely due to
the slime mold. I believe it is seeking
further prey to consume.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_01.text:
If we do not address this situation,
the monsters will be absorbed by the
Beast King. This will make him very
powerful. We will not be able to fight him.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_03.text:
We should collaborate with Green Division.
They can gas the area. This will put the
monsters into a state of paralysis.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_04.text:
A plan well-suited for a
weakling such as yourself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_05.text:
Er, yes, I suppose so. Regardless,
this will prevent us from losing
any of our precious samples.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_00.text:
Lower this gate, insect,
for the Beast King awaits beyond!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_01.text:
Are you sure? Have you made
all the necessary preparations?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_02.speaker: HERO
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_02.text: The Dismal King is ever prepared.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_00.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_00.text:
Whoa, crazy. I can't believe the
Beast King's causing trouble again.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_02.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_02.text:
Yeah, so a while back, somebody from Red
Division stole a cursed sword from us.
We all figured the Beast King was behind it,
but he always refused to admit it. Anyway, one day he up and died,
and we ended up getting it back.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_03.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_03.text:
I mean, stealing a cursed sword and
keeping it until you die? What a loon!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_04.text:
I cannot speak to his motives,
but please allow Red Division to take
custody of that sword once more. A normal artifact container will not suffice.
It must be kept safe from the slime mold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_05.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_05.text:
Oh man, alien! You got yourself
mixed up in something weird again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_06.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_06.text:
I did not 'get myself mixed up' in anything.
Rather, all of you keep getting drawn in by
my power—which is making my time here on
Delta Base very entertaining indeed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_07.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_07.text:
Hey, if you say so! But right then: one cursed sword,
coming right up.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_08.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_08.text:
Explain why you refer to this
item as a 'cursed sword'?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_09.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_09.text:
Oh, because anyone who wields it is
cursed with horrible, never-ending pain!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_00.text:
So this is the cursed sword? Mmm.
I certainly sense the power of
the dark emanating from it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_03.text:
What? No! I don't want to
live in never-ending pain!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_06.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_06.text:
Yellow Division said the Beast King
stole this from them. Know you why
he desired it so deeply?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_07.text:
We calculated that the power of that sword's
curse prevented the slime mold from taking over
his consciousness—and we were RIGHT!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_08.text:
The Beast King got the power of the slime mold
without being consumed by it, and it was
all thanks to that curse!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_09.text:
Sadly, the power of the curse ate away
at his mind and made him REALLY violent. Eventually we had to take the sword away,
at which point he was immediately consumed
by the slime mold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_10.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_10.text:
When the Beast King bears the sword, the slime
mold weakens. Yet even with him taken over by
said mold, he continues to seek the sword.
This is a contradiction. Explain.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_11.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_11.text:
It's because his will is still working
AGAINST the slime mold. He wants to
reclaim the sword—and in doing so,
reclaim his very self. Please, you have to help him!
Give him that sword, I beg you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_12.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_12.text:
So it is a choice between a Beast King
enslaved by slime mold and one cursed
by his own sword? They sound equally
entertaining to me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_13.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_13.text:
So long as I can watch you all be drawn in
by darkness, I care not which transpires.
Do as you will with the sword, insect.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_00.text:
You'll not escape me
this time, Beast King!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_01.text:
Here, Beast King! It's your sword!
Take it and reclaim yourself!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_02.text:
Wonderful! You never betray my expectations
of you, Overseer. I would have you show me
even more of your fetid darkness!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_03.text: As for you, Beast King—I am here!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_440
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_04.text: I am the Beast King...and I am REBORN!

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_MON_KATANA_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_MON_KATANA_000_000.text: Ah, slime mold. I truly enjoyed that.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_MON_KATANA_000_010.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_MON_KATANA_000_010.text:
He managed to free himself
of the slime mold at last.

SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_MON_KATANA_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_GIMK_SIUG_MON_KATANA_000_020.text:
And now it is time for my
audience with the Beast King.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_00.text: I'm terribly sorry to bother you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_01.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_01.text:
Ah, it's you. I received word of your request
from my researchers. We're happy to cooperate,
but take no responsibility for what happens
to your samples as a result of the gas.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_02.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_02.text:
Hello again, alien. You seem to have quite
the habit of getting swept up in these
sorts of things, don't you?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_03.text:
I did not 'get swept up' in anything.
Rather, all of you keep getting drawn in by
my power—which is making my time here on
Delta Base very entertaining indeed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_04.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_04.text: Mags, help them prepare the gas.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_05.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_05.text: I'll take care of this, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_06.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_06.text: Ah. It is to be Mags, then.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_07.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_07.text:
Whenever you get involved in these affairs,
Mags, fascinating things tend to happen.
I trust I will not be disappointed!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_08.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_08.text:
Aw, it's so sweet of you to say that!
I feel like all I do is disappoint
everybody around here, but you've
always got my back, alien. Thanks!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_09.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_09.text:
Okay, the gas is ready. We can use the tank
on the lower level to disperse it throughout
the area, so let's get moving.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_00.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_00.text:
This is Green Division's gas tank.
Er, but it's primarily used for the
creation and cooling of fresh air,
and not for spreading poison.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_01.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_01.text:
The gas should have a sedative effect on the
monsters. We don't dare use anything close to
a lethal dose, because that might cause some
very big problems for the rest of the base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_02.text:
A wise decision. Our division is
composed of beings from a variety
of different species, after all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_04.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_04.text:
Okay, the gas I derived from the
monophid seeds is in the tank.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_05.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_05.text:
All you gotta do now
is flip the switch!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_08.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_08.text:
It...worked? It WORKED!
Mags, you beautiful genius!
You've done it again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_00.text:
No, Beast King! Don't die!
You can't leave me!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_01.text:
You need not worry. Though his body will likely
wither to nothingness after 3,000 cycles of slime
mold possession, the darkness of his soul will
live as a part of the Dismal King forever.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_02.text:
That's not good enough! Slime molds,
consume me instead! Use my nutrients
to return the Beast King to life!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_04.text:
It's happening! The consciousness of all
the life-forms the slime mold has ever
consumed are flowing into me! Ah! The Beast King is here too!
Oh, my friend, how I've missed you!
If only I'd known this back then!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_05.text:
Kat! I order you to seal us in that capsule
and number it 440A. Should a slime-removal
technique be discovered, you are to...to...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_07.text:
I owe you an apology for all we put
you through, alien. But now I must
ensure capsule 440A is properly sealed.
We will speak later.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_08.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_08.text:
Ah, your darkness truly was intoxicating.
Should you ever awaken, Overseer,
do come and find me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Greetings, alien. I apologize for involving
you in so many irregular situations.
I assure you the overseer and the Beast King
are now safely asleep in Capsule 440A.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_01.text:
I understand you are now the
overseer of Red Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_02.text:
A being like myself? Leading Red Division?
I cannot believe it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_03.text:
I viewed my predecessor as a reckless being.
A human too chaotic to even process his own data.
But I saw what happened to him in the end,
and realize the Beast King was his true friend. I have no one like that in my life.
I have no friends. I...envy him.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_04.text:
I agree that his actions were exquisite.
But you need not envy him, for you
possess a lovely darkness of your own.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_05.text:
I appreciate your attempt to cheer me up.
We would not have resolved this without you,
alien. You set aside your own goals for the
sake of Delta Base. We all thank you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_06.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_06.text:
You need not thank me, for I have richly
enjoyed the experience. That said, it is
nearly time I moved on from this world.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_07.text:
I hope you will return one day.
Go with our gratitude.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_00.text:
Uh, this is Specimen 056, alien.
We don't need data for this one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_01.text:
Data for this monster already exists.
There is no need to fight it.
I would advise against it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_02.text:
Then this is not the
monster I seek.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_00.text:
Uh, this is Specimen 098, alien.
We don't need data for this one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_00.text:
Uh, this is Specimen 507, alien.
We don't need data for this one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, hey! Welcome to Yellow Division, 
where we conduct research on the 
civilizations of various worlds. So you're an alien, right? Cool, cool.
The subjects of our research don't
usually come to us—or at least that's
what the division overseer told me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Nor, I imagine, do you often encounter
beings such as the Dismal King!
Now answer: Are all the members
of Yellow Division machines?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, if only! I'm Unit B888888, dispatched
from Administration to take over the
overseer's managerial duties. I'm actually the only robot assigned to
Yellow Division. Oh, and everybody here
calls me 'Bean.' Hilarious, right!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_030.text:
The Yellow Division overseer has been in
pretty poor health lately, so he's resting
up at the medical facility. But the work doesn't care when a guy's sick,
and it just keeps pilin' up! That's why they
sent me here to help out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Which reminds me, I was supposed to
do something... Oh, right! Promptly
deliver the alien to the overseer.
Guess we better get on that. C'mon!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_000.text:
Greetings, alien. I am pleased you've come
to visit us, and would like to ask you
many questions about your home world.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_010.text:
You must be the Yellow Division
overseer. I had heard you were
in poor health. Is this accurate?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_020.text:
It appears you hail from a world rich in 
compassion—or so I gather from the fact
you are inquiring about the health of
a complete stranger. But let us start over, as in my
excitement I have quite shamefully
failed to introduce myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_030.text:
I am indeed the Yellow Division overseer,
and my health is indeed rapidly worsening.
In truth, I do not know how much time I have. But perhaps my luck is turning, for here,
in my moment of deepest despair, you have
appeared—and through you, I will gain
all manner of new knowledge!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_040.text:
Then I shall educate you about the
splendor of Yomi, from which I hail.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_050.text:
A moment, please. I haven't the strength
to absorb all you have to say. Bean, have you made preparations to
conduct a full research interview?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_060.text:
Yeah, about that. The research scientists
are still down in the lower-level archives,
so I couldn't put a plan together. Those guys! They probably got their noses
caught in some dusty old tome and lost all
track of time! Ha ha ha!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_070.text:
I would certainly like to read these
tomes that are so captivating as to
make your researchers forget their work.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_080.text:
The last thing I need is you getting
absorbed in a book as well, sir. Bean, would you be so kind as to
help the alien find the researchers?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_000.text:
I didn't want to worry the overseer,
but the researchers are actually studying
ancient cursed tomes. So, uh, they've
probably been cursed, is my guess.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_010.text:
Assailed by otherworldly dark powers?
My interest only deepens.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_020.text:
Wow, alien, you're kind of a kook!
C'mon, I'll activate the lift and we
can go down together.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_000.text:
I opened this ancient text purely out
of curiosity and was promptly cursed.
Now I can't move and everything hurts.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_010.text: The fiend that was sealed within the volume wishes to use my body in order to manifest itself in reality. And while that's likely going to be terribly unpleasant in the end, I am appreciating the opportunity to experience a curse firsthand!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Whoa! A fiend sealed in a tome is
manifesting itself through a curse?
We have to document this!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_030.text:
While I am impressed at their eagerness
to accept dark presences into their souls,
I believe helping to free them would
ultimately lead to a preferable outcome.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_050.text:
Thank you very much. Now if you'll excuse me,
I need to go and document what happened back
at the division office.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_060.text:
The members of Yellow Division seem
to possess some very dark qualities.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_070.text: Aw, that's nice of you to say.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_080.text: So the curse can also be lifted by slaying the associated fiend? I must document this! ...Urgh. Oh dear. While I'm happy the curse is lifted, I'm somehow in even more pain now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_090.text: It is all in your head.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_100.text: He has no one to blame but himself!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_000.text:
When I started reading this ancient tome,
it unleashed some manner of horrible curse.
Now I can't move. Ugh.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Now THIS is interesting! It appears to be a
DNA conversion script that turns its reader
into a fiend! I've gotta try that sometime...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_030.text:
So none of you inquisitors
fear the power of the dark?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_040.text: Huh? No, of course we do!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_070.text:
This is some extremely valuable curse
data! Time to download it to the ol'
memory banks...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_080.text:
It appears that by slaying the monster,
the DNA conversion reverses itself.
What an advanced curse!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_090.text:
I can almost see your little robot
heart bursting with excitement.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_100.text:
The conversion script has disappeared!
Fight it again, please!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_000.text:
When we read the tome, our backs froze up
and we couldn't move. I surmise that we
have all been cursed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Guys, come on! You were sent here in a group
of three specifically so you could watch each
other and make sure no one looked at, read,
or opened anything!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_020.text:
Sorry, but...you know. Researchers?
Our curiosity got the better of us.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_030.text:
The temptation of the dark
is never easy to resist.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_040.text:
Dear me. When curiosity overcomes
reason, things go terribly wrong.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_060.text:
Do not let this dissuade
your pursuit of darkness.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_070.text:
Honestly, I didn't expect the curses
to take effect so quickly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_080.text:
We never should have
read those books.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_090.text:
Consider yourself lucky that slaying
those fiends lifted the curses!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_000.text:
Now that all of our researchers are safe,
it's time for me to head back and prepare
your qualitative research interview.
Thanks for your patience, friend!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_020.text:
This world is pervaded with a great deal
of darkness. I'm quite looking forward
to discovering my next worthy thrall.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_090_CUT_010_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_090_CUT_010_000.text:
Will you attempt to dispel
the curse for us, alien?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_000.text:
If you are ready, I will tell you
about my home world of Yomi.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, about that. When I reported the cursed
tomes incident to the overseer, he ordered me
to continue researching them, seeing as I'm
immune to curses and all. Anyway, looks like your interview is
gonna have to wait.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Truly, the power of darkness never fades!
Incidentally, have you some basis for
assuming yourself immune to curses?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Okay, why would you even say that!?
Are you TRYING to scare me here?
Of course I'm immune! ...Right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_040.text:
None can say. But as your becoming
cursed would not affect me whatsoever,
by all means carry on.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Ugh. UGH. Now I'm just a nervous wreck about
this whole thing. But I can't say 'no' to an
overseer on his deathbed, sooo...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_060.text:
If you need me to rescue you,
merely speak the words.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_010.text:
A page torn from a book has found
its way into the folds of my clothes.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Heavens, man! That looks like a page
from the mysterious tome known as
the Necronomicon!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Yes, I found it earlier.
You know of this book?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Yes, that's a Necronomicon page, all right.
This is highly auspicious: that book is said
to tear out its own pages and grant good
fortune to whoever returns them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Might I have that page?
I'm DYING to test that theory!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_050.text:
I had intended to give it to you, but have
now changed my mind. As the Dismal King,
I am curious to experience what this
'good fortune' might feel like.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Tsk! Should have just kept my mouth shut.
But if the Necronomicon flays your flesh
from your bones, don't come crying to me!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Shall I return this page
to the book?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_010.text: Mmm. It's in a sorry state.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_030.text: This is not worth the trouble.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_020_CUT_000_000.text:
Alas, I had hoped to experience the same
good fortune as the fabled heroes of old.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_021_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_04_021_CUT_000_000.text: Mmm. I grow weary of this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_000.text:
What manner of activity
occurs in this place?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Hello, alien, and welcome to Yellow Division!
As to your question, since this is a research
facility, research happens!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Here at Yellow Division, we conduct research
on the civilizations of various worlds.
The subjects of this are many and varied,
but often include aliens like yourself!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_040.text: And you are the division overseer?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Boy, you sure do ask a lot
of questions, alien! But no, I'm Advanced Office-work Model B888888,
dispatched by the Administrative Division
to handle the organizational duties of
Yellow Division's current overseer. Oh, and everybody here calls me 'Bean.'
Hilarious. right!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_060.text:
So here's the thing, alien: I've been ordered
to bring you to the overseer the moment you
arrive, but...I don't really want to.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Yet as a machine, you must obey the
orders of your fleshy betters.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Hence the problem. Since I have to prioritize
orders without regard for my own feelings,
I suppose we're off to see the overseer. But before we go, let me fill you
in on a little something:

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Due to a recent illness, the overseer
has become excessively paranoid. And between you and me, I bet he's
going to think you've come here to
reclaim the cultural artifacts taken
from your world by Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_100.text:
I cannot repudiate that. If an item is
objectively interesting, who would
not want to take it for themselves?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Yeesh, remind me to hide my souvenir spoon
collection from you. Also, please don't
say that in front of the overseer, okay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_000.text:
There you are, alien!
From which world do you hail?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_020.text:
So you've come to reclaim the cursed
sword for one brother or the other,
I take it? Listen, those brothers must be kept apart!
Should they find each other once more,
they will wage a war that will claim 
the lives of everyone around them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_030.text:
Cursed swords have a will of their own.
If the sword is here, it's because that
is where it wants to be—and even the
Dismal King cannot defy the will of such.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_040.text:
I am pleased you understand. But to come
all the way from Yomi and leave without
beholding the sword would be a fate
far too cruel for words!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_050.text:
Bean, you will permit this alien to
view the sword—under the strictest
of supervision, of course.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_000.text:
Your response sure made the overseer happy,
alien—I haven't seen him look so satisfied
in quite a long time. In fact, he's been nothing but ill-tempered
lately, much to the sorrow of everyone in
Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_010.text:
Anyway, I need to make a follow-up report
to the overseer, so please go view the
sword in question regardless of your
actual level of interest in the matter.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_020.text:
A sword is nothing more than a tool
for killing, meaning they are all
cursed to some extent or another. If you take enough lives, the curse can
grow so as to dominate the weapon.
The sword in question is one such blade.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_030.text:
So you weren't merely patronizing him!?
Oh! In that case, let's go view the sword.
I'll activate the lift to the lower level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_000.text: Are these pieces of the cursed sword?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_010.text:
I assure you that this is not our doing;
the sword was originally created to separate
in this fashion, and for now it must remain
in this disassembled state.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_020.text:
He's right! The moment you appeared here,
alien, this sword started to vibrate.
These vibrations triggered a dimensional
resonance that caused energy forms to appear.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_030.text:
By which Bean means monsters. Yet by separating
the sword's pieces, we can lessen its resonance
and weaken the energy forms it spawns—making
the monsters smaller, in other words. And that's why we're keeping the thing in
pieces while we investigate the source.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_040.text:
Mmm. This must be why the overseer
thought there was a connection
between the sword and myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_050.text:
When disassembled, a pattern resembling words
appears on the surface of the blade. We believe
this has some sort of supernatural or ceremonial
significance, but that's still being investigated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_060.text:
...Oh dear. It seems an energy form has
found us. Bean, could you do something?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_070.text:
Allow me to handle it. You lot can
inspect these monsters for clues.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_000.text:
What shape was the sword
in originally?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_010.text: Sadly, that's not exactly an easy thing to describe. Based solely on its appearance, one would hardly surmise it was a weapon at all. However, one could definitely sense a sort of power contained within it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I sense power even from these fragments.
Did the blade have any nicks or rust?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_030.text: Oh, nothing of the sort! See, the technology here in Delta Base let us restore it to a flawless state. Er, although we did lose possession of it for a bit after that...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_040.text:
But we haven't performed any sort of in-depth
study since it was returned to us. Honestly,
the only reason we're even looking at the
thing now is because you showed up.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_050.text:
My own power may have
some influence upon it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_060.text:
That's precisely what we're looking into!
Although, again, it's entirely possible
this is unrelated to your being here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_070.text:
Say, uh, Bean? I think we're about to
have another energy form on our hands.
Can you take care of it, please?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_000.text:
Have you made any progress
with the inscription?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_010.text:
It clearly indicates that something will happen
when the sword is reassembled, but the risk of
doing so is too great until we find a way to
stop the vibration.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_020.text: And how will you do that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_030.text:
We're attempting to negate the vibration by
reversing the characters of the inscription,
but we haven't been able to focus on the task
with all the energy forms running about.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh, no worries!
We can handle that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_050.text: I will handle that. You will watch, as always.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_000.text:
It appears that if we create a replica with
the inscription reversed, it will conversely
absorb the vibrations—which will let us safely
continue our research on the upper level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_010.text:
I will let you handle
the rest, Bean.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_000.text:
When the energy forms disappear, their energy
flows back into the sword—which means the
sword itself may be a kind of generator. We need to study it further once
we have the other pieces.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_010.text:
Can you take care of that
for us, please?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_000.text:
So this sword isn't actually a weapon.
While it may have been used as one,
that was never its intended function. But as to what its proper function
actually is, we don't yet know.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_010.text:
Regardless, this sounds like a fruitful
avenue of study, don't you think?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_030.text:
These pieces should allow us to reassemble
the sword. We can then show it to the alien
in accordance with the overseer's orders.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_060.text:
I appreciate your patience, alien!
Don't worry, we'll have this thing
patched back together in no time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_070.text:
Aw, don't be like that! Just take a
look once it's put back together.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_000.text:
We finished restoring the sword, alien!
Come take a look!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_010.text: Did you just break it again?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, I'm sure you of all people remember
what it's supposed to look like, right? That's why I'm taking you to the artifact-
restoration workshop so you can experience
the restoration duties of a Yellow Division
member firsthand!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_050.text:
Splendid work! And with this, I can officially
say that I've followed the overseer's order
to show you the sword.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, and there's MORE good news! The repair of
the sword seems to have made the overseer feel
better; he intends to return to work and
study the sword's true purpose personally!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_080.text:
Hey, so you also seem to have something of an
interest in the sword's true nature, right?
If so, you should join us in our research!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_110.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_110.text:
A fragment of the sword?
But it seemed complete without it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_120.text:
There truly is something most
unpleasant about that weapon.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_130.text:
Ack! No! I don't know if I'll be able
to put it back together again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_000.text: What manner of activity happens here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_010.text: Mmm. Perhaps it did not hear me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Are you too awed at the sight of the
Dismal King to operate your mouth?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Or has my grandeur perhaps caused
you to perish on the spot?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Fully functional, thank you! However, I have been ordered to ignore the
alien—which is you—and would appreciate you
not interfering with that, especially since
you are FAR more assertive than I expected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_060.text:
The Yellow Division overseer ordered the
entire division not to engage with the alien—
and as his administrative surrogate, I had
no choice but to follow said order. Oh, and please don't ask me why he issued that
order, because I have ZERO idea. Frankly, I feel
like chatting with you is a wonderful opportunity
for cultural exchange!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Then I shall meet this overseer.
Where is he at the moment?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_080.text: Oh, I'm afraid the overseer has been in poor health for quite some time and is currently being treated in the medical facility. And while visitors aren't expressly forbidden, it won't be easy to get in.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_090.text:
The medical facility it is.
You have my thanks.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Ack! I didn't expect he'd pursue
him right into the hospital!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I understand the Yellow Division's
overseer is here. Bring him forth!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_120.text:
The Yellow Division overseer is I, alien!
Now why have you come!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_130.text:
You ordered your division to ignore me,
which piqued my interest—so I have come
to meet the man who dared do as much.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Your visit here has put the entirety of 
Delta Base in danger, alien—which is why
I want you to complete your objective and
leave as quickly as possible. And as far as Yellow Division saw it,
ignoring you seemed like the best way
to achieve that outcome.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_150.text:
So you seek to avoid me for fear of the dark.
But if you believe that keeping me at bay
will forestall the encroaching darkness,
you are a man wholly mistaken.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_160.text:
You should come with me, robot, to document
the envelopment of your world in the dark.
Let us educate your overseer as to its appeal!
But first, I would have your name.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_170.text:
I am B888888, but the members of Yellow
Division refer to me as 'Bean.'
Also, I never imagined you'd be so pushy
about all of this! Sheesh!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_180.text:
And where is it darkest
here on Delta Base?
