SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_190.text:
Not sure if it's the kind of darkness you're 
talking about, but the lights are total crap
down on the lower level. Anyhoo, let's take the Yellow Division
lift down there and I'll show you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Behold the spriggans! These gem-eating beings
are always nibbling on Yellow Division's
precious-minerals collection, which is a
real bother for us all. So if that's not an example of whatever
vague metaphorical darkness you mean,
then I don't know what is.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_010.text: Mmm. I will take a closer look.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_020.text: Hey, don't let me stop you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_000.text:
Yeah, that's not a spriggan.
There's nothing darkness-y
at all about that one there.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_010.text:
And what makes you think you are
qualified to determine what level
of darkness is sufficient for me?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, let's just call it a hunch!
You'd be better off ignoring 'em.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_010.text:
That was not the level of darkness
I had in mind. Show me more.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh? That's a drag. But you've still done
us a great service by getting rid of those
awful spriggans! Now let's gather up the
gem fragments they dropped.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Aw, don't look so glum.
There'll be other chances!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_000.text: You bring me to another spriggan?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Hey, don't be so hasty! The natures of
spriggans differ on an individual basis. 
I mean, that one right over there could
be dark as darkest night or...whatever.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_020.text:
Mmm. Then I suppose I should
discover this for myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_030.text:
That's right! You'll never know
for sure until you do!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_000.text: How'd that work out for you?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_010.text:
It was no different from
the first ones we fought.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, how about that... But don't lose hope,
because there are still plenty more around!
Oh, but let's make sure to gather up these
gem fragments before we go find 'em, okay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_000.text: I need see no more spriggans!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_010.text: Sure, but this could be a monster camouflaging itself as a spriggan!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_020.text:
Mmm? It is gnawing on a gem.
This is indeed a spriggan true.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_030.text:
IS it though? I mean, you'll never know
for sure unless you fight it, right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_040.text:
Is your precious-minerals collection truly so
valuable that you would con the Dismal King
into eradicating these pests for you?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_050.text:
WHAAAT!? I'm shocked! Shocked, I tell you!
Why, that couldn't be further from the truth!
All I'm doing here, alien, is trying to help
YOU find your darkness! Also, it isn't just a 'gem' that thing
is eating—it's an invaluable specimen
known as the philosopher's stone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_070.text:
A philosopher's stone is a tool that produces
magical energy. They're incredibly rare,
and highly valued by magic users!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_080.text:
Then perhaps you should have simply asked
me to eradicate the monsters that are
busily consuming said stones.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_090.text: Look, I never intended to deceive you: There really is all sorts of awful stuff down here! Er, but it's also true I used you to get rid of some of it, so, uh... Sorry.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_100.text:
As it is a king's duty to help the weak,
you need only ask with proper fealty
and deference to secure my aid.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_110.text:
I'm truly moved by your forgiveness,
alien, and refuse to believe your
presence here could possibly pose
any threat to Delta Base!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_120.text: Then carry on with the tour.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, goodie! Thanks to you, we recovered
the pieces of some very precious stones!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_020.text:
Your philosopher's stone remains
functional even in pieces?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_050.text:
If you put all the pieces in the
correct place, the stone returns
to how it used to be! Yes, the philosopher's stone has some real magic,
all right. Er, but they don't snap together
by themselves, so you have to do it manually.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_070.text:
Whoa! I never imagined an alien like you would
possess such capabilities! Why, this could lead
to significant advances in our understanding of
the philosopher's stone, so thanks for that!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_080.text:
That was more challenging
than I expected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_090.text:
If it's so difficult that even a Bean
Model-8 like myself struggles to put
it back together, it's no surprise
that you couldn't do it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_100.text:
I'll bring the philosopher's stone back,
and then we can get to work on
your spirit thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_120.text:
A shard of a gemstone?
But no pieces were missing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_130.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_130.text:
Perhaps this is another curious aspect
of the stone's magic? Regardless,
I will hold onto it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_140.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_140.text:
I'll bring the pieces of the philosopher's stone
back, and then we can get to work on your
little spirit thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_000.text:
Good news, alien! I reported our latest
adventures to the overseer and handed
over the philosopher's stone you fixed. I thought for sure he'd be mad at me,
but he actually praised me instead! It seems
his whole 'ignore the alien' order has been
completely forgotten.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_010.text: He must value that stone a great deal.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_020.text:
Regardless, it is no longer necessary
for you to quickly conclude your
business and leave Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh, but there was a piece of bad news at the
end: The overseer ordered me to start prepping
the next experiment, so documenting darkness
will have to wait until that's finished.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_040.text:
Then I shall pursue my amusement
elsewhere on Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I bring good tidings, alien! The overseer's
health has improved, and he'll officially
be resuming his duties today!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_020.text:
While I admit I'm pushing myself somewhat,
the mental anguish from staying cooped up
in that medical facility would be far worse
for me in the long run. Now then, Bean. Isn't there an
additional piece of news to share?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Indeed there is! We've had a breakthrough
in our research into the cursed tomes,
and now know it's connected to our
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is an
anatomical model made of a rare metal
called orichalcum. Please note that while we believe the
skeleton to be man-made, it is not a
human skeleton, and therefore does not
resemble either you or the overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_050.text:
The skeleton contains means of
both locomotion and communication. As such, it is likely modeled after an
exoskeletal life-form, with an appearance
indicative of the beings that inhabit
the world on which it was created.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_060.text:
And what is the connection
to the cursed tomes?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh, right! See, when I read through the
ancient tomes to verify their contents,
I wasn't cursed in the same way the
fleshy researchers were. Instead, the transformative functions of
the tome activated my internal mechanisms!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_080.text:
You do not appear transformed
in the eyes of the Dismal King.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Whaaat? You can't even tell that
my processing speed has tripled!? No, that's a joke. I was already
fully activated, so there was no
visible effect.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_100.text: But it did give us the idea of using the tome's curse on the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! And upon further investigation, we found numerous commonalities that suggest the specimen and cursed tomes are connected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_110.text:
In summation, we believe the curse
in the ancient tomes is, in fact,
an activation command for the
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_120.text:
And I suspect you did not stop there.
Have you attempted to activate it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_130.text:
You're a step ahead of us, alien!
In fact, we were just thinking
we should do exactly that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Because without activating it,
you understand nothing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Totally! All the theories in the world won't
add up to the value of a hands-on test.
Am I right there, Overseer?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Exactly so, Bean. I appreciate how you
have a wonderful way of saying things
I often struggle to express. Now then, alien. If you are ready,
I would very much like you to witness
our grand experiment.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_190.text:
All necessary preparations
have been made.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_000.text: Alien! We must speak of the sword.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Should you not be in the
medical facility, Overseer?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_020.text:
My physical condition is irrelevant!
All that matters is that the sword is
innately connected to the Orichalcum
Skeletal Specimen! Now tell me everything you know about
the specimen, and do not lie!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_030.text:
What is this specimen
of which you speak?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is a
skeleton created from a rare metal
called orichalcum.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_050.text:
It contains means of both locomotion and
communication, and we believe it to be an
anatomical model of an exoskeletal life-form.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Don't play dumb with me, alien!
I know you really came here to recover
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! But as I'm about to prove, we have already
solved its mystery—and we have no intention
of returning it to you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_070.text: Mmm. Then I wish you luck.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_090.text:
That man is utterly obsessed with his
skeletal specimen. If I really were to
steal it from him, I wonder what colors
I might see run across his face?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_100.text:
Please, alien! Just come observe this
one experiment! Do it for ol' Bean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_110.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_110.text:
Your overseer clearly
does not want me there.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_120.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_120.text:
But if something goes wrong with the experiment,
Yellow Division will need help dealing with it—
and the overseer is too proud to seek aid from
the Administrative or any other division!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_130.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_130.text:
Yet you yourself are from the
Administrative Division, no?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_140.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_140.text:
Sure, but I'm sort of a special case because
I was involved with reassembling the sword.
Please help me here! I'm begging you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_170.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_170.text: I appreciate you even considering it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_180.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_180.text:
Please help me out here, alien!
I'm begging you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_000.text:
A moment, alien! I heard what happened with
the philosopher's stone. Your hard work was very
much appreciated, and I apologize for suggesting
you might bring misfortune to Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Is the philosopher's stone
truly so important to you?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_020.text:
As I gazed upon the restored stone,
I suddenly recalled the Orichalcum 
Skeletal Specimen whose study we had
neglected for so many years. I was struck with an intuitive sense 
that this was the key to its mystery!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_030.text:
What is this specimen
of which you speak?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is an
anatomical model made of a rare metal
called orichalcum. Please note that while we believe the
skeleton to be man-made, it is not a
human skeleton, and therefore does not
resemble either you or the overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_050.text:
The skeleton contains means of both
locomotion and communication. As such, it is likely modeled after an
exoskeletal life-form, with an appearance
indicative of the beings that inhabit
the world on which it was created.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_060.text:
I believe we can use the power of the
philosopher's stone to set the skeletal
model in motion, giving us valuable clues
into the civilization that created it. Oh, but I could not be more
excited about the prospect!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_070.text:
The experiment's all ready to go, alien,
so we're hoping you might do us the
honor of observing it with us?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This is the skeleton? Though I sense there
is more here than immediately meets the eye,
it appears mechanical to me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It sure does, doesn't it!? But that strong
mechanical appearance is an aspect our
cultural researchers had to shed their
preconceived assumptions about. See, because whoever made the specimen
clearly felt it was skeletal in nature,
not mechanical.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Now let us begin the activation of
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! I will read from the cursed tome.
That way, should anything go wrong,
the sacrifice will be mine alone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_030.text:
For when I said I had recovered, that was
a lie. One way or the other, this will be
my final duty for Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_060.text:
The curse... I can feel it...
Agh! Such...pain! But I must continue! Before long, 
the transformation...should...begin...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_080.text:
The changes are too much
for his body to endure.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_100.text: Oh wow! That was the overseer!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Ah, of course! I am now inside
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! As I suspected, the curse was never a curse
at all, but merely a way for the people of
that world to transfer themselves into a
new exoskeleton.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Nice job, Overseer. The experiment was a
success! Now please share your observations
with us so we can take notes.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_140.text:
I am gradually beginning to understand how
this skeleton works. At the brink of death,
I have been freed from my withered, useless
body and awakened inside a new one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_150.text:
You're blowing my mind here, Overseer!
I mean, with that new skeleton, you might
be able to live on forever!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Hmm? Who are you? What are
all of you doing in...?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Overseer? What's happening?
Who are you talking to?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_190.text:
No... No! I'm not alone in this body!
There are hundreds—no, thousands
of others...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_210.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_210.text:
Uh-oh. The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
is attempting to access Delta Base's
information networks.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_220.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_220.text:
So the overseer's consciousness
has been subsumed?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_230.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_230.text:
Correct... Cannot defy the majority...
Cut us off... Protect...Delta...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_240.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_240.text: All is in your hands, Bean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_250.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_250.text:
I am acting as fast as my
processors allow, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_260.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_260.text:
The specimen intends to use the overseer's
knowledge to take over Delta Base. You must
physically cut Yellow Division off from the
network in order to protect it. I will attempt to interfere with the
specimen's communications systems
in order to buy you time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_270.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_270.text:
I'll work as fast as I can,
alien, but please hurry!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_280.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_280.text: I will go along with your plan.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_000.text:
For so many years, the Orichalcum Skeletal
Specimen has stood as a great mystery even
within Yellow Division's varied collection. But now, its connection to the reassembled
sword is clear: we can expect that the
interdimensional energy pulses released by
the blade will activate its skeletal frame.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Now, let us begin the experiment.
Bean, do not forget to document
everything. And...begin resonating!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Yes, it is exactly as predicted...
As the sword and I resonate together,
so too does the skeletal frame. This sword is the key that bonds
the skeleton to its wielder.
Increase the resonance!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_040.text:
The overseer collapsed.
Has the experiment failed?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Uh-oh. That voice is coming from the
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen, but it
sounds like the overseer!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_070.text:
Correct, Bean. I am now within the specimen.
Or perhaps it would be more accurate to say
that the specimen is now I? Behold, alien! I have achieved the full
integration with the Orichalcum Skeletal
Specimen which you could not!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_080.text:
You certainly seem pleased to have bonded
with your beloved skeleton, but what do you
have in store for us now? I do hope your
answer to that is an entertaining one!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_090.text:
I'm going to infiltrate the core systems
of Delta Base and take control of all of its
functions! Such a feat will be a simple task
inside my new body.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_100.text:
Once I am in full command of Delta Base,
I will begin my advance into all the other
worlds, thereby bringing their civilizations
under my control as well!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_110.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_110.text:
Oh ho! So you intend to challenge
the Dismal King himself!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_120.text:
Your master is quite the interesting
fellow, Bean. Also, what are you doing?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_130.text:
I'm currently in the process of diverting all
the skeleton's connection requests through me
in hopes of slowing his access to Delta Base's
systems—so please stop him already!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_140.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_140.text:
So be it. Feast your eyes as I demonstrate
to this fool what it means to possess
the power of a king!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_000.text:
So this is your orichalcum skeleton?
It certainly bears little resemblance
to skeletons I am familiar with.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, I'd love to know what sort of civilization
these people created—and I bet reactivating this
skeleton will tell us all about it! The overseer
is a genius for thinking up this plan!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_020.text:
Thank you, Bean. And now that I have the
philosopher's stone, let us begin our activation
of the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_030.text:
It was a wise choice to build the frame
out of orichalcum. It is extremely durable,
yet adaptable enough to meet the needs
of multiple civilizations. However...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_050.text:
Mmm. Suddenly he speaks as if he
was the one who created the thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_060.text:
We didn't have the energy source to power
the orichalcum frame, and so were only
able to operate it briefly. Now that we have the philosopher's stone,
however, its power should ensure a
sufficient duration of operability.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_080.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
is now online.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_090.text:
The overseer has been
pulled into it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Analyzing all information... Overseer...
Yellow Division... Delta Base...
Organizational structure... Analysis complete. Placing Delta Base
under our authority.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_110.text:
Uh-oh! The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is
attempting to access Delta Base's information
network! Attempting to cut off accyrk•#

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_120.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_120.text:
Infiltrat*t5 Delta $9wBase netwo4u@%*8$ym.
Please physically sever Yellow Divisio*5n
from netw0r# to protect Delta Ba3&^j.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_130.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_130.text:
It is always something
with that one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_000.text:
This must be a control terminal.
I assume I sever this?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_030.text:
The connections have all been severed.
A pity, for I would have enjoyed seeing
the entirety of Delta Base subsumed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_040.text:
Now let us see if Bean has managed
to avoid being eaten by the skeleton.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_000.text:
The Yellow Division area
has been cut off.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_010.text:
Confirming isolationlationlationlation...
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen sevevevevered...
...Hmm? My processessessing speed appears to
be dropping. Initiating reboooooot...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_020.text:
And what about him? ...Mmm?
Have you gone to sleep!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_030.text: Ah. The time has come for fun!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_010.text:
&j823 network #2uf&& secured.
Plea$3se stop ^4r6 Orich*1hym
Sk3#4tal Specim*n.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_020.text:
You wish me to stop the skeleton?
Then it shall be done.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_000.text:
If we lifted the curse, the transformation
should reverse and return the overseer
to his former body.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Alas, that does not appear to be the case.
That curse truly was a curse—or perhaps it
was a punishment. This body is a prison. I will be
captive here forever, with no hope
of escape or death.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_020.text:
Would that be so bad? The immortality that
so many humans have sought without success
is now yours, meaning you can continue
your research for all time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_030.text:
A fair point, alien. I am now able to
visualize the culture that felt it
necessary to create such a prison. Once I am able to communicate with the others 
trapped in here, I do look forward to continuing
my research. Therefore, I view this not as a
punishment, but as an opportunity.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen will soon
shut down and enter an eternal slumber.
Thank you, alien. Farewell, Bean.
Glory to Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_050.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
is now offline.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_060.text:
Don't blame yourself for this, alien:
the die was cast the moment the overseer
transferred himself into the skeleton. In fact, you were right to put
a stop to it when you did!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_000.text:
I trust you now understand you
lack what it takes to be a king?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_010.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_010.text:
Vile alien! I will never permit the
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen to fall
into your treacherous hands!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_030.text:
Don't blame yourself, alien.
That sort of paranoia has always been
part of the overseer's general nature. Between his sickness and his advanced age,
I'm guessing he just couldn't hold it
back anymore.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_040.text:
Plus, who knows what effect the
sword and skeleton had on him?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_050.text:
You believe the sword and skeleton
claimed control of his mind?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_060.text:
I think it's a strong possibility, sure.
But I'd like to reassemble both artifacts
to investigate them further.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_070.text:
That seems a time-consuming process.
Are you certain it is worth it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_080.text:
Oh, it's a trivial matter for the researchers
of Yellow Division. In fact, that's just the
sort of thing they live for!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_000.text: You there. Can you still hear us?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_010.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_010.text:
I was ensnared by the power
of the philosopher's stone and
set these events in motion. To everyone in Yellow Division, I am
deeply sorry. My behavior has been a
disgrace to all of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_020.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_020.text:
And yet, alien, this all came to pass because
of your presence. Had you not come here,
I never would have touched the stone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_030.text: Forgive me for saying so, Overseer, but this all would have happened eventually even without the alien! In fact, his being here saved us all from a much greater disaster.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_040.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_040.text:
Heed me, all members of Yellow Division!
You are to have nothing to do with the alien!
That is my final order.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_050.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_050.text:
The philosopher's stone is running out
of energy... Ah, but this is a surprise...
I expected it to last longer...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_060.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
has gone offline.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_070.text:
And sorry, alien, but until a new overseer
is chosen, the orders of the former one
have to remain in effect—which means I
won't be able to help you anymore.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_080.text:
Spare it no thought, Bean. My arrival may well
have spurred the overseer to lose control,
but his loss was my gain, for I have most
thoroughly enjoyed my time here. And with that, I must away.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_000.text: How did you find Delta Base, alien?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_010.text:
I deeply enjoyed it. There is so much
darkness lurking here; I expect this
world will develop into an even more
appealing place in the future.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, don't worry about the overseer!
One day, Yellow Division will find a way
to safely reactive the Orichalcum Skeletal
Specimen and reunite with him. And when that happens, all the mysteries
of the skeleton will be solved!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_030.text:
When the overseer awakens, tell him
I look forward to our next encounter.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_040.text:
I certainly will! But for now,
I take it it's time for you to
continue your own journey?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh! Heya, alien! I was so focused on my
repair work that I didn't notice you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_040.text:
I've only achieved 0.01% of the desired result.
Sadly, I can't even begin to calculate when my
duties might be finished.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_050.text:
No need to rush things.
You've plenty of time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_060.text:
Thank you, alien. I take it you'll
be leaving Delta Base now?
If so, this must be goodbye.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_070.text:
It is indeed. But thanks to you,
I've had a most wonderful time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_080.text:
Oh, it's we in Delta Base who should be
grateful to you! Should you visit us again,
your registration will be complete, and you
will no longer be referred to as 'alien.'

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_090.text:
Oh? I actually rather enjoyed the
novelty of being called 'alien.'

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_000.text: What are you doing here, alien?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_020.text:
Is that so? How unexpected.
Well, goodbye.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_030.text:
What has become of the
orichalcum skeleton?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_050.text:
You've ended your research
into the object?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_060.text:
There is no purpose in keeping unneeded
things lying about. It is only logical
that they be disposed of.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_070.text:
So long as you're sure you no
longer need it, I suppose not.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_080.text:
...Did the alien see through
my clever facade?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_090.text:
Just to be safe, I'll do some meddling when
he enters the connectivity gate to ensure
he becomes lost in the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So this is the cell where the overseer
claimed an alien was being held.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The sense of darkness emanating from
this place feels somehow...familiar.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Have you brought me information about another
new world? Just leave it over there, please;
I'm in the middle of this and can't step away. You see, I've just about figured out how
to claim the wealth of a certain world
all for myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_050.text:
I know that voice...
You're the Warden of Greed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Why if it isn't the Dismal King! What brings you
to this far-flung place? I knew you'd forsaken
us wardens, but what could have possibly caused
you to abandon Yomi entirely?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_070.text: In their king's absence, the wardens all began to do as they pleased. I certainly never had any expectation of loyalty from you and your ilk, but to simply abandon the darkness of greed is something I cannot allow.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_080.text: I'm sorry, did you just accuse me of abandoning greed? Because it is only since arriving at Delta Base that I have finally learned the true meaning of the word! No, I intend to claim everything in the entirety of the Conjoined Worlds—an act that will bring me joy far beyond anything I could possibly experience in tiny Yomi.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_090.text:
If your greed has evolved to a new level,
then that is a wonderful thing,
and I salute you for it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Not that I require it, but yes.
Behold what I have accomplished!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I have stolen the wealth from rulers of
worlds and given them ruin in return!
I've left them to wander roadsides,
wailing and gnashing their teeth!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Then do your duty as a warden and
offer up a portion of that wealth
in tribute to your Dismal King!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_130.text:
You would take from the paragon of greed?
Ah, truly you are a magnificent one,
my king—your mere presence has sent
the flames of my greed blazing!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Take your tribute, then—but know this!
One day, I will steal back what my
Dismal King has plundered from me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_150.text:
So that's how a Dismal King operates?
Mmm. This has been quite the valuable
learning experience.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Beings of darkness are covetous things.
The avarice that exists within all must be
preserved and given to flourish.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Then it seems I must try to
be more covetous myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_001_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_OLD_001_CUT_000_000.text:
So this is my tribute from
the Warden of Greed, mmm?

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Connection_Operator
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Alert! Alert! An unapproved external
connection has been made from outside
the connectivity gate.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Connection_Boss
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Impossible. No one has forced their
way through the connectivity gate
for 15,462 cycles.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Connection_Boss
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
External lock disengaged.
Our commands are being overridden.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.text:
All security teams, assemble at the
connectivity gate! Anti-alien protocols
have been initiated!

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.text:
A mechanical doorway? This world already
strikes me as less than appealing.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.text:
Hmm? I was just struck by the comforting
feeling of returning home, mingled with
the ennui of a journey reaching its end.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.text:
Is this your home world, Philosopher?
Or perhaps a base of operations for your
journeys through the Conjoined Worlds?

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.speaker: Base_Sheriff
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.text:
Scanning. Trespasser does not match
known records of Delta Base members.
Alien status confirmed.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.text:
The alien will be interrogated by the
Council of Overseers. They will decide
the means of its disposal.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.text:
Overseers, mmm? Perhaps this world has
its own version of watchtower wardens.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_00.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_00.text:
The fate of captive aliens is determined
by the Detention Division. With infiltrating
aliens, however, the Council of Overseers
has jurisdiction.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_01.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_01.text: And if we fail to reach consensus?

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_02.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_02.text:
If you entrust the matter to
the Administrative Division,
we will handle disposal.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_03.text:
Disposal sounds good to me—where does trash
belong but in the trash can? Then we can pretend
this unapproved external connection never
happened and all walk away happy.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_04.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_04.text:
If we simply ignore what happened,
it could easily pave the way to
our own destruction.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_05.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_05.text:
This incident also calls our own ethics into
question. How can we allow ourselves to intrude
upon other worlds if we refuse to grant the
same privilege to others?

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_06.text:
Oh, okay. So you two lofty overseers think
it's just peachy keen to let this alien
run around harassing us? I mean, the thing is calling itself a king
and prattling on about some 'thrall' it's
looking for! What about any of that strikes
you as appropriate?

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_07.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_07.text:
If you know this thrall you seek exists
on Delta Base, alien, I would have you
share your evidence with us.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_08.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_08.text:
The evidence is that I am now here.
The Dismal King would not have been
guided to this world were there not
a worthy thrall to be found.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_10.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_10.text:
And yet he shows complete confidence
in his claims—and while we have no
evidence to support them, nor do we
have any to refute them.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_11.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_11.text:
I assure you, a being fit to serve as my
thrall exists somewhere on this world.
I ask only your leave to find them.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_12.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_12.text:
Oh, suuure! We'll just let an alien
wander freely around Delta Base
doing whatever it pleases! I don't know where you come from,
alien, but we have rules here!
Very important rules!

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_13.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_13.text:
Would it be acceptable to assign him
a monitor? Yellow Division excels at
cross-cultural communication, yes?

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_14.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_14.text:
A monitor without the capability
to fight would serve no purpose.
It should come from Red Division.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_15.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_15.text:
Sure, we can fight—but no one
actually knows the rules better
than the Administrative Division!

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_16.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_16.text:
The Council of Overseers has reached its
decision. The Administrative Division
will assign a monitor to the alien
as it searches for this 'thrall.'

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_17.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_17.text:
Understood. As the Administrative
Division's representative, I will
assign a monitor to the alien.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_00.text:
I'm Administrator Gold, your assigned monitor.
I ask that you complete your task quickly,
alien, as I have little free time to spare.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_01.text:
Rush not the Dismal King! My journey has
only just begun, and it would be a shame
if I were unable to fully enjoy it.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_03.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_03.text: Er, are you speaking to me?

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_04.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_04.text:
You are a match to a record of a former
Delta Base member. However, due to the
strangeness of this situation, you will
also be carefully monitored. I advise you not to attempt
any 'funny business.'

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_05.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_05.text: You're saying I used to be a member here?

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_06.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_06.text:
To be from Brighthome suggests you were
reborn from elsewhere, does it not? Ah, but death is such a great inconvenience
in these worlds where it can be experienced
but once! To an immortal such as myself,
I fear it means precious little.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
The Council of Overseers has granted
you permission to seek your thrall,
but nothing else. Is this understood?

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
I am making my way through the division
in search of appealing prospects.
It is a rather elaborate search.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
I fail to understand what constitutes
an 'appealing prospect.'

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, but this stagnant,
recycled air brings me back...

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Such air is the very source
of the darkness in this world.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Have you truly come here for the purpose
of finding a thrall? Because I sense very
little energy being devoted to that task.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Are you blind to my passion for my work?
Alas, as the Dismal King, I am ever subject
to appeals from the masses—and as their
benevolent lord, I must hear their pleas.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
I understand this sentiment. The Administrative
Division is also constantly fielding requests
from the other divisions while asking nothing
in return.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Have you still not found
the thrall you seek?

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
No. Perhaps it will reveal itself
after another circuit of your world.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
If you enjoy helping out so much, you should
consider joining the Administrative Division—
although I can't say I've ever heard of us
employing outsiders before.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Explain yourself, alien. Why have the
other divisions had nothing but trouble
from the moment you arrived?

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Because I am the Dismal King. My great
power incites both chaos and disorder,
ultimately transforming Delta Base into
a far more appealing world.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Wow, thanks so much. But I think you've
done quite enough of that, so maybe you
should immediately refocus on finding
this thrall of yours... Like, now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.text:
Why am I being forced to visit the
lower level? Do you know for a fact
this thrall of yours is down there?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.text: Do you not wish to go there?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.text:
Of course I don't wish to go there!
It is dangerous and dirty, and no place
for a fine administrator like myself.
Conclude your business there quickly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_000_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_000_CU.text: I feel as if I know her.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_000_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_000_CU.text:
That could be. It feels like the memory
is there, but some part of me wants
to keep it far below the surface.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_000_CU.text:
Then it is a memory I would very much like
you to recall. Perhaps a more significant
trigger will prove necessary.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_100_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_100_CU.text: I remember now—and I wish I'd listened to the part of me that kept pushing the memory down, because I would give anything to forget it. It's got my loins all a'shiver...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_100_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_100_CU.text:
My understanding is that shivering
loins are usually associated with
more pleasant memories.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_100_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_100_CU.text: Not this time! Back then, she used sweet words to get close to me, just as she now does to you. I knew the woman wanted something from me, but I never imagined it might be...that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_100_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_100_CU.text:
Tell me more. I would hear every detail of
both the humiliation you felt and the anger
you directed at yourself. Let us now expose
every last aspect of your plight!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_100_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_100_CU.text:
She...laid eggs in me. Every day,
my stomach grew larger and larger,
and she happily documented all of it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_100_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_100_CU.text:
No. They grew so large and so fast,
my abdomen could not contain them.
I remember a violent pain,
and then...nothing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_100_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_100_CU.text:
And what did you think, Philosopher, as your
belly began to swell in those early days?
Did you experience deep thoughts worthy
of your given name?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_100_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_100_CU.text:
As I watched her measure and photograph my
stomach with a mixture of excitement and
apprehension, I felt as if I was becoming
someone other than myself. I also experienced an intense curiosity to
meet the beings that might be born from me,
although that would never come to pass.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_LIF_100_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_000_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_000_CU.text: I feel as if I know him.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_000_CU.text:
A former colleague, perhaps?
Or a subordinate?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_000_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_000_CU.text:
The memory's so fuzzy... It feels like
something I'd be happier not recalling.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_100_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_100_CU.text: I remember now—and I wish I'd listened to the part of me that kept pushing the memory down, because I would give anything to forget it. It has me feeling gooey and itchy all over...

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_100_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_100_CU.text:
Then I suspect this memory concerns
the slime molds. Having fought them,
I know the sensation well.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_100_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_100_CU.text:
It all started because of
the Beast King.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_100_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_100_CU.text:
I could tell he was mad from the moment
he began calling himself that, and so
always tried to keep my distance. But one day, I blundered into one of
his rampages and was slashed repeatedly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_100_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_100_CU.text:
Another Red Division member applied slime
mold to my wound—to stop the bleeding,
he claimed. But he was responsible for
all of the horrors that followed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_100_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_100_CU.text:
The pain from the wound turned to a
gooey itchiness, then worked its way
into a sort of...pleasantness. But I was being consumed by the slime mold,
and my consciousness eventually became part
of the colony. Indeed, it may still be
a part of Specimen 440 today.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_100_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_100_CU.text:
Your being called to Brighthome suggests you
managed to separate yourself from the mold.
For that, we may have King Din to thank.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_100_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_MAG_100_CU.text:
Oh? I wonder. I have a theory that King Din
had nothing whatsoever to do with summoning
us to that place, and that we therefore owe
the man nothing at all. Instead, I save my gratitude for the one
who led us safely out of Brighthome.
So thank you, Count.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_000_CU.text:
Do you have any memory of
meeting that overseer?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_000_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_000_CU.text:
None whatsoever. And I suppose
it's little surprise I don't remember
the robot, either.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_000_CU.text:
Mmm. You must not have had any
connection to Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_050_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_050_CU.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen!
Whatever you do, don't touch it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_050_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_050_CU.text:
You are familiar with this
skeleton, Philosopher?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_050_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_050_CU.text: Familiar? I am the one who found it— as well as one of the many who was sucked up into it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_100_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_100_CU.text:
One thing I understand from being sucked into
that skeleton is that it provides a sort of
immortality—although quite different from the
kind you possess, Count. Regardless, it is a most unnatural thing,
and this is how such wrongness manifests.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_100_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_100_CU.text:
There are reasons death and undeath are
as they are. To attempt to circumvent such
reasons is to bring darkness into the world.
Ah, but challenging rules is a wonderful thing!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_100_CU.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_PHILOSOPHER_CLT_100_CU.text:
I suppose it would be, from your perspective.
How nice it must feel to be so free!
I would give anything for that feeling.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG__PHILOSOPHER_RETURN_00.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG__PHILOSOPHER_RETURN_00.text:
Count, I want you to take me to a world
where I can be truly free. I desire to see
things from the same vantage as you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG__PHILOSOPHER_RETURN_00.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG__PHILOSOPHER_RETURN_00.text: Then you shall have the brand.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG__PHILOSOPHER_RETURN_00.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG__PHILOSOPHER_RETURN_00.text: I will give it to you later.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG__PHILOSOPHER_RETURN_00.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG__PHILOSOPHER_RETURN_00.text:
I welcome you into my thrall, Philosopher.
I now have you in my gaze at all times.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG__PHILOSOPHER_RETURN_00.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG__PHILOSOPHER_RETURN_00.text:
Your blood will become a part of me,
and will make me the Dismal King.
Together into eternity shall we live.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG__PHILOSOPHER_RETURN_00.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG__PHILOSOPHER_RETURN_00.text:
I appreciate the sentiment.
Let us leave it there for now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_GET_KENZOKU_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_GET_KENZOKU_000_CUT_00.text:
While you are a truly fascinating being,
I cannot take you on my journey.
But know that a piece of you will
ever be with the Dismal King.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_GET_KENZOKU_000_CUT_00.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_GET_KENZOKU_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, wow... It's almost like you just
asked me to marry you! Tee hee!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_GET_KENZOKU_010_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_GET_KENZOKU_010_CUT_00.text:
Your singing voice is a thing of beauty,
and I long to take you on my travels. Alas, I dare not risk your song rendering
my thralls useless, and will have to
sate myself with your blood instead.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_GET_KENZOKU_010_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_GET_KENZOKU_010_CUT_00.text:
You appear quite pleased to become
a part of me. I bid you keep singing,
for my sake if nothing else.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
My journey in this world
is concluded. Farewell.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Wait. If you do not connect to the gate
with great care, you will end up lost
in the Conjoined Worlds. Stay here and I will summon assistance
from the Administrative Division overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Tell me, have you ever
gone through that door?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Members of the Administrative Division
do not leave Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.text:
So you are held prisoner on your world
as I once was. Yet do you never desire
to look outside?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I have served the same role in the
Administrative Division since the moment
I was born, and will continue to do so
until all my higher functions cease. It took 8,000 cycles before I was promoted and
made an administrator—which is regarded as an
unusually fast ascent—and I have now served
as said administrator for over 5,000 cycles.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_070.text:
But this 'outside' of yours.
Is it...fun?

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_080.text: I quite enjoyed my time outside.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Ah, but someone is coming.
You must decide. Quickly!

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Understood. I will accompany
you and see the outside.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_010_CUT_000_000.text:
My journey in this world is done.
It is time to leave Delta Base behind.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Wait. If you do not connect to the gate
with great care, you will end up lost
in the Conjoined Worlds. Stay here and I will summon assistance
from the Administrative Division overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_010_CUT_000_030.text:
The alien has departed.
What an unusual life-form.

SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_010_CUT_000_040.text:
You will now return to your
normal duties, Administrator Gold.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_03.speaker: Base_Sheriff
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_03.text:
Entry not found in Delta Base registry.
Alien status confirmed.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_05.speaker: Base_Sheriff
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_05.text:
Aliens must be monitored at all times.
Please follow all applicable rules.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_00.text:
I am Administrator Gold, your assigned
monitor. I hear you've come in search
of...'worthy thralls'? Do such things
truly exist here?

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_02.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_02.text:
In that case, I ask that you find
them quickly, for I am very busy. My coworkers are envious of my having been
given the 'easy' role of a monitor, but I fail
to see what is so enviable about it—for when it
is done, I will still have piles of missed work.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.text:
Pssst! You can trust me with your true secret
objective for coming here, alien. Are you a
spy sent from another base? Or a saboteur?

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.text: Sabotage would indeed be a lark!

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.text:
That part was a joke. But what about your
having been sent here by another base?
Was I correct about that part?

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_03.text:
Disposal? Are you nuts!?
That would be a huge waste! Look, I'm sure we can find some use for the alien.
Maybe it could teach in Yellow Division's Academy
of Foreign Cultures? Oh, or we could use it as
breeding stock for Green Division!

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_04.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_04.text:
Yellow Division wants nothing
to do with this.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_05.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_05.text:
First of all, kindly stop referring to our
life-cycle research specimens as 'stock.'
Secondly, we have no plans of using the
alien in any of our research.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_06.text:
Seriously? You're gonna let a chance
like this slip through your fingers? Well, if you're really not interested,
I'm sure you won't object if we in
Red Division put the alien to good use!

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_07.text:
Until you find this thrall you seek,
alien, I ask that you make yourself
at home here on Delta Base.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_08.text:
Assign him a caretaker from the
Administrative Division, would you?

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_09.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_09.text:
A monitor, you mean?
Yes, he will require a monitor.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_00.text:
I am Administrator Gold, and I have been
assigned as your monitor. But as I have no
interest whatsoever in monitoring you,
feel free to do as you please.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_01.text:
Then I will do so,
and with gratitude.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_02.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_02.text:
Just don't cause any trouble. If anything
goes wrong, I'm the one who's going to
be chewed out by my bosses.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_200_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_200_CUT_0.text: I never cause trouble. It merely finds me.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_200_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INTERMISSION_200_CUT_0.text: Well, not much you can do about that!

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_00.text:
Mmm. The door to this world
appears to be a normal one.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_04.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_04.text: I find it to be surprisingly normal.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_08.text:
I hereby declare today to be Alien
Appreciation Day! Hip hip, huzzah!

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_09.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_09.text:
All right, that's more than enough of...
whatever this is. This alien isn't some
amusingly exotic species—it's a terribly
dangerous life-form. For all we know, it's swarming with germs
and pathogens. It may even seek to destroy
us through cultural pollution or weapons
of mass destruction that it smuggled in. But do not worry: the Administrative
Division is on top of the matter.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_00.text:
Greetings. I am Administrator Gold,
and I will be your attendant. ...Attendant to an alien. Wow.
I'm probably never going to
have a duty like this again.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_01.text:
Does Delta Base not get many
visitors from other worlds?

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_02.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_02.text:
It has never happened in all the cycles I
have been here, which makes this all rather
exciting. So welcome to Delta Base, alien!

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_05.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_05.text:
You are a match to a record of a former
Delta Base member. This seems impossible,
and yet the Administration's records are
flawless and without peer.

SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_06.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_06.text: So, uh, welcome home, I guess!
